items.title: Paddington 2
items.overview: Paddington, now happily settled with the Browns, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy, but it is stolen.

media.title: Paddington 2
media.overview: Paddington, now happily settled with the Browns, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy, but it is stolen.

items.title: The Intern
items.overview: 70-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

media.title: The Intern
media.overview: 70-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

items.title: The Martian
items.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

media.title: The Martian
media.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

items.title: Legally Blonde
items.overview: Fashionable sorority queen Elle Woods has it all, but, she wants nothing more than to be Mrs. Warner Huntington III. But he dumps her before heading to Harvard Law School. Elle rallies all of her resources and gets into Harvard, determined to win him back. While there, she figures out that there is more to herself than just good looks.

media.title: Legally Blonde
media.overview: Fashionable sorority queen Elle Woods has it all, but, she wants nothing more than to be Mrs. Warner Huntington III. But he dumps her before heading to Harvard Law School. Elle rallies all of her resources and gets into Harvard, determined to win him back. While there, she figures out that there is more to herself than just good looks.

items.title: School of Rock
items.overview: Fired from his band and hard up for cash, guitarist and vocalist Dewey Finn finagles his way into a job as a fifth-grade substitute teacher at a private school, where he secretly begins teaching his students the finer points of rock 'n' roll. The school's hard-nosed principal is rightly suspicious of Finn's activities. But Finn's roommate remains in the dark about what he's doing.

media.title: School of Rock
media.overview: Fired from his band and hard up for cash, guitarist and vocalist Dewey Finn finagles his way into a job as a fifth-grade substitute teacher at a private school, where he secretly begins teaching his students the finer points of rock 'n' roll. The school's hard-nosed principal is rightly suspicious of Finn's activities. But Finn's roommate remains in the dark about what he's doing.

items.title: Knives Out
items.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

media.title: Knives Out
media.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

items.title: Ocean's Eleven
items.overview: Less than 24 hours into his parole, charismatic thief Danny Ocean is already rolling out his next plan: In one night, Danny's hand-picked crew of specialists will attempt to steal more than $150 million from three Las Vegas casinos. But to score the cash, Danny risks his chances of reconciling with ex-wife, Tess.

media.title: Ocean's Eleven
media.overview: Less than 24 hours into his parole, charismatic thief Danny Ocean is already rolling out his next plan: In one night, Danny's hand-picked crew of specialists will attempt to steal more than $150 million from three Las Vegas casinos. But to score the cash, Danny risks his chances of reconciling with ex-wife, Tess.

items.title: Gone Girl
items.overview: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

media.title: Gone Girl
media.overview: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

items.title: The Dark Knight
items.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

media.title: The Dark Knight
media.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.

items.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
items.overview: Struggling to find his place in the world while juggling school and family, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales is unexpectedly bitten by a radioactive spider and develops unfathomable powers just like the one and only Spider-Man. While wrestling with the implications of his new abilities, Miles discovers a super collider created by the madman Wilson "Kingpin" Fisk, causing others from across the Spider-Verse to be inadvertently transported to his dimension.

media.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
media.overview: Struggling to find his place in the world while juggling school and family, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales is unexpectedly bitten by a radioactive spider and develops unfathomable powers just like the one and only Spider-Man. While wrestling with the implications of his new abilities, Miles discovers a super collider created by the madman Wilson "Kingpin" Fisk, causing others from across the Spider-Verse to be inadvertently transported to his dimension.

items.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
items.overview: The Grand Budapest Hotel tells of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting, the battle for an enormous family fortune and the slow and then sudden upheavals that transformed Europe during the first half of the 20th century.

media.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
media.overview: The Grand Budapest Hotel tells of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé. The story involves the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting, the battle for an enormous family fortune and the slow and then sudden upheavals that transformed Europe during the first half of the 20th century.

items.title: Blade Runner 2049
items.overview: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

media.title: Blade Runner 2049
media.overview: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

items.title: Roman Holiday
items.overview: Overwhelmed by her suffocating schedule, touring European princess Ann takes off for a night while in Rome. When a sedative she took from her doctor kicks in, however, she falls asleep on a park bench and is found by an American reporter, Joe Bradley, who takes her back to his apartment for safety. At work the next morning, Joe finds out Ann's regal identity and bets his editor he can get exclusive interview with her, but romance soon gets in the way.

media.title: Roman Holiday
media.overview: Overwhelmed by her suffocating schedule, touring European princess Ann takes off for a night while in Rome. When a sedative she took from her doctor kicks in, however, she falls asleep on a park bench and is found by an American reporter, Joe Bradley, who takes her back to his apartment for safety. At work the next morning, Joe finds out Ann's regal identity and bets his editor he can get exclusive interview with her, but romance soon gets in the way.

items.title: Casablanca
items.overview: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

media.title: Casablanca
media.overview: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

items.title: The Godfather
items.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

media.title: The Godfather
media.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

items.title: Ted Lasso
items.overview: Ted Lasso, an American football coach, moves to England when he's hired to manage a soccer team—despite having no experience. With cynical players and a doubtful town, will he get them to see the Ted Lasso Way?

media.title: Ted Lasso
media.overview: Ted Lasso, an American football coach, moves to England when he's hired to manage a soccer team—despite having no experience. With cynical players and a doubtful town, will he get them to see the Ted Lasso Way?

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: American football coach Ted Lasso is hired by a wealthy divorcée to coach the English soccer team AFC Richmond.

episodes.name: Biscuits
episodes.title: Biscuits
episodes.overview: It's Ted's first day of coaching, and fans aren't happy. He makes little headway but remains undeterred as the team plays its first match.

episodes.name: Trent Crimm: The Independent
episodes.title: Trent Crimm: The Independent
episodes.overview: To arrange an in-depth exposé, Rebecca pairs cynical journalist Trent Crimm with Ted for a day. Ted and Roy venture into the community.

episodes.name: For the Children
episodes.title: For the Children
episodes.overview: Rebecca hosts the team's annual charity benefit, where Ted stages a reconciliation between Roy and Jamie.

episodes.name: Tan Lines
episodes.title: Tan Lines
episodes.overview: With his wife and son visiting from America, Ted makes drastic changes to the lineup during a critical match.

episodes.name: Two Aces
episodes.title: Two Aces
episodes.overview: When Jamie refuses to train, Ted turns to talented new signing Dani Rojas—and the team is struck by an age-old curse.

episodes.name: Make Rebecca Great Again
episodes.title: Make Rebecca Great Again
episodes.overview: Rebecca celebrates her first anniversary as a divorcée as the team plays a match in Liverpool.

episodes.name: The Diamond Dogs
episodes.title: The Diamond Dogs
episodes.overview: Ted and Roy are both having relationship problems. Ted consults the Diamond Dogs while Roy has a talk with Keeley.

episodes.name: All Apologies
episodes.title: All Apologies
episodes.overview: After a series of mistakes on the pitch, pressure mounts to bench Roy. Rebecca drops a bombshell.

episodes.name: The Hope That Kills You
episodes.title: The Hope That Kills You
episodes.overview: Richmond plays a climactic match that will determine the fates of Ted and his club.

episodes.name: Goodbye Earl
episodes.title: Goodbye Earl
episodes.overview: AFC Richmond brings in a sports psychologist to help the team overcome their unprecedented seven game tie-streak.

episodes.name: Lavender
episodes.title: Lavender
episodes.overview: Ted is surprised by the reappearance of a familiar face. Roy tries out a new gig.

episodes.name: Do the Right-est Thing
episodes.title: Do the Right-est Thing
episodes.overview: Rebecca has a special visitor shadow her at work. A player's return is not welcomed by the team.

episodes.name: Carol of the Bells
episodes.title: Carol of the Bells
episodes.overview: It's Christmas in Richmond. Rebecca enlists Ted for a secret mission, Roy and Keeley search for a miracle, and the Higginses open up their home.

episodes.name: Rainbow
episodes.title: Rainbow
episodes.overview: Nate learns how to be assertive from Keeley and Rebecca. Ted asks Roy for a favor.

episodes.name: The Signal
episodes.title: The Signal
episodes.overview: Ted is fired up that the new team dynamic seems to be working. But will they have a chance in the quarterfinal?

episodes.name: Headspace
episodes.title: Headspace
episodes.overview: With things turning around for Richmond, it's time for everyone to work on their issues—like Ted's discomfort, Nate's confidence, and Roy's attention.

episodes.name: Man City
episodes.title: Man City
episodes.overview: Ted and Dr. Sharon realize they might have to meet each other halfway. Tensions are high as the team prepares for the semifinal.

episodes.name: Beard After Hours
episodes.title: Beard After Hours
episodes.overview: After the semifinal, Beard sets out on an all-night odyssey through London in an effort to collect his thoughts.

episodes.name: No Weddings and a Funeral
episodes.title: No Weddings and a Funeral
episodes.overview: Rebecca is stunned by a sudden loss. The team rallies to show their support, but Ted finds himself grappling with a piece of his past.

episodes.name: Midnight Train to Royston
episodes.title: Midnight Train to Royston
episodes.overview: A billionaire football enthusiast from Ghana makes Sam an unbelievable offer. Ted plans something special for Dr. Sharon's last day with the team.

episodes.name: Inverting the Pyramid of Success
episodes.title: Inverting the Pyramid of Success
episodes.overview: Richmond gets their final chance to win promotion as Ted deals with the fallout of Trent Crimm's painfully honest exposé.

episodes.name: Smells Like Mean Spirit
episodes.title: Smells Like Mean Spirit
episodes.overview: The newly promoted AFC Richmond face mockery as pundits predict they'll finish dead last this season.

episodes.name: (I Don't Want to Go to) Chelsea
episodes.title: (I Don't Want to Go to) Chelsea
episodes.overview: News of a top player looking to move to London sends the English clubs into a frenzy. Richmond play their first game back in the Premier League.
Richmond adjust to an exciting change, but Jamie has reservations. Ted learns there's something new going on back in Kansas as well.

episodes.name: Big Week
episodes.title: Big Week
episodes.overview: Everyone's feeling the pressure as Richmond gear up to play West Ham. Ted is reunited with an old friend.

episodes.name: Signs
episodes.title: Signs
episodes.overview: With their season in a tailspin, Richmond try to right the ship against mighty Manchester City. Off the pitch, everyone faces their own setbacks.

episodes.name: Sunflowers
episodes.title: Sunflowers
episodes.overview: A friendly match takes the team to Amsterdam, where one night out unlocks truths for many.

episodes.name: The Strings That Bind Us
episodes.title: The Strings That Bind Us
episodes.overview: The Greyhounds try a new strategy that has everyone thinking outside the box. Sam prepares to host a VIP guest at Ola's.

episodes.name: We'll Never Have Paris
episodes.title: We'll Never Have Paris
episodes.overview: While watching Henry, Ted fights the urge to spiral when Michelle and Dr. Jacob go on a romantic trip. An online leak has massive implications for Keeley.

episodes.name: La Locker Room Aux Folles
episodes.title: La Locker Room Aux Folles
episodes.overview: Colin and Isaac's friendship is tested. Roy is asked to do a press conference.

episodes.name: International Break
episodes.title: International Break
episodes.overview: While some of the Greyhounds head home to play for their countries in international matches, Edwin Akufo brings a business proposal to Rebecca.

episodes.name: Mom City
episodes.title: Mom City
episodes.overview: An unexpected guest has Ted on edge. When Richmond travel to Manchester for a big match, Roy and Keeley become concerned about Jamie.

episodes.name: So Long, Farewell
episodes.title: So Long, Farewell
episodes.overview: AFC Richmond play their final game of the season.

items.title: Gilmore Girls
items.overview: Set in the charming town of Stars Hollow, Connecticut, the series follows the captivating lives of Lorelai and Rory Gilmore, a mother/daughter pair who have a relationship most people only dream of.

media.title: Gilmore Girls
media.overview: Set in the charming town of Stars Hollow, Connecticut, the series follows the captivating lives of Lorelai and Rory Gilmore, a mother/daughter pair who have a relationship most people only dream of.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: When Rory is accepted to attend a prestigious prep school, Lorelai must swallow her pride and ask her wealthy parents for help paying the tuition.

episodes.name: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton
episodes.overview: Rory's first day at Chilton doesn't go smoothly: First, Lorelai's attire offends Emily and the headmaster; then Rory meets some obnoxious classmates.

episodes.name: Kill Me Now
episodes.title: Kill Me Now
episodes.overview: When Rory and Richard bond during a day of golf at the club, Lorelai feels jealous of Rory's deepening connection with her grandparents.

episodes.name: The Deer Hunters
episodes.title: The Deer Hunters
episodes.overview: After Rory receives a bad grade on her English paper, Lorelai helps her cram for a big Shakespeare exam – but catastrophe strikes on test day.

episodes.name: Cinnamon's Wake
episodes.title: Cinnamon's Wake
episodes.overview: Lorelai admits she has feelings for someone. Meanwhile, Rory has a budding relationship of her own that is moving forward.

episodes.name: Rory's Birthday Parties
episodes.title: Rory's Birthday Parties
episodes.overview: Rory clashes with Emily when Emily plans a formal birthday party for her. Meanwhile, Lorelai organizes a casual get-together to celebrate.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.title: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Rory shares a romantic moment with Dean, but doesn't tell Lorelai. When Lorelai hears about it from Mrs. Kim, she invites Dean over for movie night.

episodes.name: Love and War and Snow
episodes.title: Love and War and Snow
episodes.overview: Snow strands Rory at her grandparents' home, while Lorelai spends the day with her beau. Meanwhile, Lane misses Rory and comes to visit.

episodes.name: Rory's Dance
episodes.title: Rory's Dance
episodes.overview: Rory attends her first dance with Dean but they get home late, causing Emily and Lorelai to fight over Lorelai's mothering skills.

episodes.name: Forgiveness and Stuff
episodes.title: Forgiveness and Stuff
episodes.overview: Misfortune strikes at the Gilmores' Christmas party. Dean assures Lorelai that nothing improper happened the night he and Rory fell asleep together.

episodes.name: Paris is Burning
episodes.title: Paris is Burning
episodes.overview: After Paris causes a scandal by exposing the relationship between a parent and a teacher, she is confronted.

episodes.name: Double Date
episodes.title: Double Date
episodes.overview: Lorelai goes on a hellish double date with Sookie, Jackson and Jackson's odd cousin. Meanwhile, Rory double dates with Dean, Lane and Dean's friend.

episodes.name: Concert Interruptus
episodes.title: Concert Interruptus
episodes.overview: Trouble ensues when Rory takes her friends to a Bangles concert in New York. Lorelai learns something about Luke's romantic past.

episodes.name: That Damn Donna Reed
episodes.title: That Damn Donna Reed
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean argue about women's roles after watching "The Donna Reed Show." Emily makes Lorelai face her feelings.

episodes.name: Christopher Returns
episodes.title: Christopher Returns
episodes.overview: Rory's father returns, causing tension in Emily and Richard's house – and forcing Lorelai to make a big decision about her family's future.

episodes.name: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers
episodes.title: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean celebrate their three-month anniversary, but things don't go as planned. Luke's ex-girlfriend Rachel arrives in town.

episodes.name: The Breakup, Part 2
episodes.title: The Breakup, Part 2
episodes.overview: After recent events, Rory keeps busy, refusing to give in to self-pity. Meanwhile, Stars Hollow's residents rally around her, much to her dismay.

episodes.name: The Third Lorelai
episodes.title: The Third Lorelai
episodes.overview: When Lorelai's grandmother offers a trust fund for Rory's education, Emily fears losing contact with a financially independent Lorelai and Rory.

episodes.name: Emily in Wonderland
episodes.title: Emily in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Emily is horrified when she sees the place where Lorelai and Rory first lived, so she sets out to create a perfect bedroom for Rory in her house.

episodes.name: P.S. I Lo...
episodes.title: P.S. I Lo...
episodes.overview: Still upset over recent events, Rory becomes angry with Lorelai, who didn't tell her that she is dating again.

episodes.name: Love, Daisies and Troubadours
episodes.title: Love, Daisies and Troubadours
episodes.overview: Rory finally tells Dean the truth about how she feels about him. Sensing something between Lorelai and Luke, Rachel makes a decision.

episodes.name: Sadie, Sadie...
episodes.title: Sadie, Sadie...
episodes.overview: Lorelai makes a big decision, but when Emily hears about it from someone else, she's hurt and angry that Lorelai didn't bother to tell her.

episodes.name: Hammers and Veils
episodes.title: Hammers and Veils
episodes.overview: Rory's sudden flurry of extracurricular activity strains her relationship with Dean. Emily is cold when Lorelai finally reveals her big news.

episodes.name: Red Light on the Wedding Night
episodes.title: Red Light on the Wedding Night
episodes.overview: During a wild party, Lorelai impulsively calls someone, and their conversation gives her second thoughts about her plans.

episodes.name: The Road Trip to Harvard
episodes.title: The Road Trip to Harvard
episodes.overview: With her big plans canceled, Lorelai is eager to escape the reactions of everyone in Stars Hollow, so she and Rory take off on a road trip.

episodes.name: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy
episodes.title: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy
episodes.overview: Lorelai tries to dissuade Luke from allowing his relative to live with him. Rory finds herself attracted to another boy.

episodes.name: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore
episodes.title: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore
episodes.overview: Rory surprises everyone by agreeing to make her debut at a ball, and Lorelai finds herself attracted to a changed man.

episodes.name: Like Mother, Like Daughter
episodes.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
episodes.overview: Advised to become more social at Chilton, Rory winds up in the most popular school clique, while Lorelai helps with a fundraising fashion show.

episodes.name: The Ins and Outs of Inns
episodes.title: The Ins and Outs of Inns
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie have the first fight of their long friendship when Lorelai panics and decides their dream of opening an inn together will fail.

episodes.name: Run Away, Little Boy
episodes.title: Run Away, Little Boy
episodes.overview: When Rory and her classmate Tristan are cast as Romeo and Juliet in a school play, a jealous Dean insists on attending every rehearsal.

episodes.name: The Bracebridge Dinner
episodes.title: The Bracebridge Dinner
episodes.overview: While Rory struggles to keep the budding rivalry between Dean and Jess under control, Lorelai invites most of Stars Hollow to an elaborate feast.

episodes.name: Secrets and Loans
episodes.title: Secrets and Loans
episodes.overview: Lorelai can't afford to repair her home's extensive termite damage but becomes angry when Rory involves Emily, who again offers Lorelai a loan.

episodes.name: Richard in Stars Hollow
episodes.title: Richard in Stars Hollow
episodes.overview: Newly retired Richard is driving Emily crazy, so Lorelai agrees to take her father for a day in Stars Hollow, where he annoys both Lorelai and Rory.

episodes.name: A-Tisket, A-Tasket
episodes.title: A-Tisket, A-Tasket
episodes.overview: The annual Stars Hollow Picnic Basket Auction causes romantic complications when Jess outbids Dean to win a picnic lunch date with Rory.

episodes.name: It Should've Been Lorelai
episodes.title: It Should've Been Lorelai
episodes.overview: Christopher brings a visitor to Stars Hollow who wants to get to know Rory. Emily is furious that Lorelai isn't trying to win Christopher back.

episodes.name: Lost & Found
episodes.title: Lost & Found
episodes.overview: Rory panics when she realizes she's lost the bracelet Dean made for her. When Lorelai spots someone in Rory's room, she makes accusations of theft.

episodes.name: There's the Rub
episodes.title: There's the Rub
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Emily's weekend at a spa doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Rory's night alone becomes difficult when Paris, Jess and Dean arrive.

episodes.name: Dead Uncles & Vegetables
episodes.title: Dead Uncles & Vegetables
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory help out at the diner while Luke makes funeral arrangements. Emily goes overboard helping to plan a wedding.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle Again
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again
episodes.overview: After helping Rory with her project for Chilton's annual business fair, Richard realizes he's tired of retirement and wants to start a second career.

episodes.name: Teach Me Tonight
episodes.title: Teach Me Tonight
episodes.overview: As a favor to Luke, Rory tutors Jess, but during their first study session, Jess convinces Rory to go on a quick outing with him.

episodes.name: Help Wanted
episodes.title: Help Wanted
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Richard establish a consulting business. Rory becomes angry that everyone blames Jess for what happened to her.

episodes.name: Lorelai's Graduation Day
episodes.title: Lorelai's Graduation Day
episodes.overview: Lorelai is about to graduate from business school, so Rory secretly invites guests to her graduation ceremony. Rory makes a trip to New York.

episodes.name: I Can't Get Started
episodes.title: I Can't Get Started
episodes.overview: On the day before the wedding, Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Meanwhile, Rory is thrilled when a familiar face returns to Stars Hollow.

episodes.name: Those Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days
episodes.title: Those Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days
episodes.overview: Back from a summer internship in Washington, D.C., Rory finds herself torn between Dean and Jess. Meanwhile, Lorelai questions her future.

episodes.name: Haunted Leg
episodes.title: Haunted Leg
episodes.overview: Emily's attempts to reunite Christopher with Lorelai and Rory result in an ugly confrontation between Rory and Christopher.

episodes.name: Application Anxiety
episodes.title: Application Anxiety
episodes.overview: After a Harvard application arrives, Rory and Lorelai seek advice. Meanwhile, Lane places an ad and becomes enamored with a respondent.

episodes.name: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes
episodes.title: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes
episodes.overview: Things get ugly when Lorelai speaks at the high school's career day. To rebel against her conservative mother, Lane does something drastic.

episodes.name: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis
episodes.title: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis
episodes.overview: After a disastrous date with a man she met at an auction organized by Emily, Lorelai tries to cancel the second date, despite her parents' objections.

episodes.name: Take the Deviled Eggs...
episodes.title: Take the Deviled Eggs...
episodes.overview: When Lorelai winds up attending a social event with Rory, she learns more about Christopher's life than she wanted to know.

episodes.name: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?
episodes.title: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?
episodes.overview: Lorelai forces Rory to be her partner at the Stars Hollow dance marathon, where Rory can't stop arguing with a boy – and another definitely notices.

episodes.name: Let the Games Begin
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin
episodes.overview: Lorelai, Rory, Richard and Emily visit Richard's alma mater, but Richard causes trouble by secretly making some arrangements in advance.

episodes.name: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving
episodes.title: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory have four Thanksgivings when they stop for celebrations with Lane, Sookie and Luke on the way to dinner with Richard and Emily.

episodes.name: That'll Do, Pig
episodes.title: That'll Do, Pig
episodes.overview: Lorelai misses the town carnival when a visitor arrives. Rory's beau won't take her to the carnival – until he learns she might go with another boy.

episodes.name: I Solemnly Swear...
episodes.title: I Solemnly Swear...
episodes.overview: A classmate convinces Paris that Rory has been plotting against her. Meanwhile, Emily is sued by a former maid, and Lorelai meets an interesting man.

episodes.name: Lorelai Out of Water
episodes.title: Lorelai Out of Water
episodes.overview: Lorelai gets an angling lesson from Luke before her fishing date with her new beau. Meanwhile, the political battle between Rory and Paris escalates.

episodes.name: Dear Emily and Richard
episodes.title: Dear Emily and Richard
episodes.overview: When Sherry goes into labor and asks Rory to stay with her at the hospital, Lorelai reminisces about the day Rory was born.

episodes.name: Swan Song
episodes.title: Swan Song
episodes.overview: Lorelai goes away with her boyfriend for a weekend in New York, but she worries about leaving Rory and her boyfriend together.

episodes.name: Face-Off
episodes.title: Face-Off
episodes.overview: Tired of waiting for her boyfriend to call and make plans for the weekend, Rory goes to a hockey game with Lane, where she sees a familiar face.

episodes.name: The Big One
episodes.title: The Big One
episodes.overview: Rory and Paris compete to give a speech at a school celebration. Meanwhile, Lorelai shares a passionate kiss with someone unexpected.

episodes.name: A Tale of Poes and Fire
episodes.title: A Tale of Poes and Fire
episodes.overview: When a meeting of the Edgar Allan Poe Society at her inn is interrupted by a disaster, Lorelai must find rooms for the guests at homes around town.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Baby
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Baby
episodes.overview: While Lorelai deals with the aftermath at the inn, Rory schemes to give her mom a special birthday party, complete with a gigantic surprise.

episodes.name: Keg! Max!
episodes.title: Keg! Max!
episodes.overview: Rory makes plans to attend the prom. Lane's rock band debuts at a big party, where longstanding animosities finally explode.

episodes.name: Say Goodnight, Gracie
episodes.title: Say Goodnight, Gracie
episodes.overview: After the brawl at her band's debut, Lane is in trouble with her mother. Later, Jess receives a visitor at the diner.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Son
episodes.title: Here Comes the Son
episodes.overview: Jess travels across the country for a visit. Rory helps Emily choose an outfit for Rory's graduation, resulting in a conflict with Lorelai.

episodes.name: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio
episodes.title: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai prepare for Rory's graduation from Chilton. But major developments involving the inn threaten to dampen the festivities.

episodes.name: Ballrooms and Biscotti
episodes.title: Ballrooms and Biscotti
episodes.overview: After returning from a summer of backpacking through Europe, Rory and Lorelai frantically prepare for Rory's move to college.

episodes.name: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Rory move into her dorm, where she meets an odd new roommate, and learns that she will also be sharing her room with a familiar face.

episodes.name: The Hobbit, the Sofa, and Digger Stiles
episodes.title: The Hobbit, the Sofa, and Digger Stiles
episodes.overview: Emily redecorates Rory's dorm room without her permission. Lorelai and Sookie cater a kids' birthday party with a "Lord of the Rings" theme.

episodes.name: Chicken or Beef?
episodes.title: Chicken or Beef?
episodes.overview: While visiting Stars Hollow for the weekend, Rory encounters Dean, who awkwardly invites her to an event the next day.

episodes.name: The Fundamental Things Apply
episodes.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
episodes.overview: Lorelai struggles to hide details of her life from Emily. Rory discovers that college dating isn't easy. Lorelai invites Luke over for movie night.

episodes.name: An Affair to Remember
episodes.title: An Affair to Remember
episodes.overview: Emily hires Lorelai and Sookie to cater an elaborate launch party for Richard's new company, but insists they prove that they are worthy of her trust.

episodes.name: The Festival of Living Art
episodes.title: The Festival of Living Art
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai participate in a Stars Hollow event in which the townspeople dress up and present tableaux imitating famous paintings.

episodes.name: Die, Jerk
episodes.title: Die, Jerk
episodes.overview: Rory tries to spice up her articles for the student newspaper. Luke admits to Lorelai that he is revisiting a past relationship.

episodes.name: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out
episodes.title: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out
episodes.overview: Emily realizes that Richard has been secretly meeting someone for lunch for years. Lorelai accepts an invitation to dinner.

episodes.name: The Nanny and the Professor
episodes.title: The Nanny and the Professor
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie renovate their inn. Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Rory is irritated by Paris's new relationship.

episodes.name: In the Clamor and the Clangor
episodes.title: In the Clamor and the Clangor
episodes.overview: Lorelai is upset that Luke has gotten an apartment in another town. Rory learns that a guy she likes has been spreading false information about her.

episodes.name: A Family Matter
episodes.title: A Family Matter
episodes.overview: Luke is wary when his sister comes to town. Lorelai hesitates to tell her parents about her new beau. Paris's affair gets serious.

episodes.name: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels
episodes.title: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels
episodes.overview: Rory crosses paths with Jess in Stars Hollow. Luke's sister visits Stars Hollow and introduces her new boyfriend to her brother.

episodes.name: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais
episodes.title: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by her classwork, Rory confides in Dean, who's working on the construction crew at the Dragonfly Inn.

episodes.name: Scene in a Mall
episodes.title: Scene in a Mall
episodes.overview: Rory gets a glimpse of Dean's new life. When Lorelai and Rory spend a day at the mall, they run into Emily on a wild shopping spree.

episodes.name: The Reigning Lorelai
episodes.title: The Reigning Lorelai
episodes.overview: Richard is devastated by a sudden loss. Emily receives a shock when she finds an old letter that was written to Richard.

episodes.name: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist
episodes.title: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist
episodes.overview: Rory and Paris head south for their first spring break in Florida, where they run into a couple of their old pals from Chilton.

episodes.name: Tick, Tick, Tick, Boom!
episodes.title: Tick, Tick, Tick, Boom!
episodes.overview: Jason and Richard are sued. Rory is upset by a decision Dean has made. Dean is told to stop spending time with Rory.

episodes.name: Afterboom
episodes.title: Afterboom
episodes.overview: Lorelai confronts her father when she learns that he has cut business ties. Luke gives Lorelai an update on his love life.

episodes.name: Luke Can See Her Face
episodes.title: Luke Can See Her Face
episodes.overview: A self-help tape helps a depressed Luke realize who his soul mate is. Lorelai is stressed as the Dragonfly Inn's opening day approaches.

episodes.name: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights
episodes.title: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights
episodes.overview: Jess walks his mother down the aisle at her Renaissance-themed wedding. Luke asks his new love interest on a date. Dean confides in Rory.

episodes.name: Raincoats and Recipes
episodes.title: Raincoats and Recipes
episodes.overview: Lorelai invites friends and family to do a test run of the Dragonfly Inn opening. Two suitors pursue Lorelai.

episodes.name: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller
episodes.title: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai argue about a choice Rory made. Lorelai is happy in her new relationship. Emily and Rory plan to take a European trip.

episodes.name: A Messenger, Nothing More
episodes.title: A Messenger, Nothing More
episodes.overview: After Rory apologizes to Lorelai, she sends a letter from Europe, which has unintended consequences. Meanwhile, Luke returns home.

episodes.name: Written in the Stars
episodes.title: Written in the Stars
episodes.overview: Lorelai is a little offended that no one cares about her new relationship – until it becomes a topic of heated discussion at the town meeting.

episodes.name: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too
episodes.title: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean meet alone to discuss where they stand with each other. Lorelai and Sookie manage Jackson's campaign for a town office.

episodes.name: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin!
episodes.title: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin!
episodes.overview: Wanting to smooth over her relationship with Dean, Lorelai suggests a night out with Luke and Rory – but the evening goes awry.

episodes.name: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant!
episodes.title: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant!
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie are thrilled when a cultural icon starts frequenting the Dragonfly Inn dining room. Rory discovers an intriguing secret society.

episodes.name: You Jump, I Jump, Jack
episodes.title: You Jump, I Jump, Jack
episodes.overview: Logan takes Rory to a mysterious and elaborate event. After discovering that Lorelai has a new beau, Emily and Richard spend time with him.

episodes.name: The Party's Over
episodes.title: The Party's Over
episodes.overview: When Emily and Richard throw a party to introduce Rory to their alumni friends, she has a realization about her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Emily Says Hello
episodes.title: Emily Says Hello
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai plan to convince Richard and Emily to reconcile, but Emily dashes their hopes by making a bold announcement.

episodes.name: But Not as Cute as Pushkin
episodes.title: But Not as Cute as Pushkin
episodes.overview: Rory hosts a high school student who's considering the same university, but things don't go as planned. Lorelai and her beau have their first fight.

episodes.name: Women Of Questionable Morals
episodes.title: Women Of Questionable Morals
episodes.overview: When Christopher visits Rory at college, she rejects his attempt at reconciliation. Lorelai consoles him but doesn't tell her boyfriend where she was.

episodes.name: Come Home
episodes.title: Come Home
episodes.overview: Rory offers to help Logan write an article. When Richard sees Emily talking to a man she dated, he has an explosive reaction.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory throw Emily a party. Richard and Emily recommit to their marriage. Rory tells Logan what she wants from him.

episodes.name: Say Something
episodes.title: Say Something
episodes.overview: After the disastrous scene at her parents' recent social event, Lorelai begs her boyfriend not to give up on their relationship.

episodes.name: Jews and Chinese Food
episodes.title: Jews and Chinese Food
episodes.overview: Lorelai is upset about the recent turn of events. Luke builds sets for the elementary school play in hopes of seeing the costume designer.

episodes.name: So... Good Talk
episodes.title: So... Good Talk
episodes.overview: Richard and Emily return from their second honeymoon. Miserable Luke burns food and handles complaining customers by throwing them out of the diner.

episodes.name: Pulp Friction
episodes.title: Pulp Friction
episodes.overview: Rory regrets agreeing with her beau to date other people. Lorelai reunites with her boyfriend but remains cold toward Emily.

episodes.name: To Live and Let Diorama
episodes.title: To Live and Let Diorama
episodes.overview: Luke helps turn an old house into a museum. Lorelai says too much during an interview about the inn. Rory, Paris and Lane have boyfriend trouble.

episodes.name: But I'm a Gilmore
episodes.title: But I'm a Gilmore
episodes.overview: When Rory tells her beau she can't have a casual relationship with him, he gives her an unexpected response. Sookie finds herself confined to her bed.

episodes.name: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?
episodes.title: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?
episodes.overview: Rory begins her internship at one of Logan's father's newspapers. Emily and Richard fawn over Rory's boyfriend, but Lorelai is not as impressed.

episodes.name: Blame Booze and Melville
episodes.title: Blame Booze and Melville
episodes.overview: Rory is surprised by the performance review she receives from Logan's father. Luke's plan to buy the Twickham house is threatened by a competing bid.

episodes.name: A House Is Not a Home
episodes.title: A House Is Not a Home
episodes.overview: Lorelai rescues Rory after a night of reckless behavior. Shocked to hear her daughter's plans for the future, she turns to Luke for help.

episodes.name: New and Improved Lorelai
episodes.title: New and Improved Lorelai
episodes.overview: Luke responds to Lorelai. Rory faces legal consequences. Angry with Rory, Richard and Emily, Lorelai cuts off ties with them.

episodes.name: Fight Face
episodes.title: Fight Face
episodes.overview: Rory winds up in a fight while performing community service. Lorelai gets a dog. Luke and Lorelai decide to renovate Lorelai's house.

episodes.name: The UnGraduate
episodes.title: The UnGraduate
episodes.overview: Rory takes a job at Emily's Daughters of the American Revolution office and serves as her grandmother's spy. Lorelai won't commit to a date.

episodes.name: Always a Godmother, Never a God
episodes.title: Always a Godmother, Never a God
episodes.overview: Sookie hopes to reconcile the estranged Gilmore girls by asking both Lorelai and Rory to be godparents to her kids, but things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: We've Got Magic to Do
episodes.title: We've Got Magic to Do
episodes.overview: After two separate confrontations with the Huntzbergers at a D.A.R. party, Richard and Emily realize Lorelai was right about their treatment of Rory.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Doll House
episodes.title: Welcome to the Doll House
episodes.overview: After asking Logan about Rory's future plans, Richard admits it was a mistake to let Rory make rash decisions and discusses the matter with Lorelai.

episodes.name: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number
episodes.title: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number
episodes.overview: Both Lorelai and Rory are saddened that their estrangement will keep them from spending Rory's 21st birthday the way they had always planned.

episodes.name: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out
episodes.title: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out
episodes.overview: When her former boyfriend visits and reveals an amazing success, Rory begins rethinking the choices she's made with her life.

episodes.name: The Prodigal Daughter Returns
episodes.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns
episodes.overview: After months of estrangement, Lorelai and Rory make their first move toward reconciliation. Luke gets a big surprise but conceals it from Lorelai.

episodes.name: He's Slippin’ ‘Em Bread... Dig?
episodes.title: He's Slippin’ ‘Em Bread... Dig?
episodes.overview: Rory's long-absent father reappears in her and Lorelai's lives, casting uncertainty on what this will mean for Lorelai's current relationship.

episodes.name: The Perfect Dress
episodes.title: The Perfect Dress
episodes.overview: Wanting to get to know his newly discovered relative, Luke makes a visit. Lorelai sets a date but has a feeling something's not right.

episodes.name: Just Like Gwen and Gavin
episodes.title: Just Like Gwen and Gavin
episodes.overview: Lorelai finds out about Luke's secret, but not from Luke. She tries to be supportive, but Luke's reaction hurts her. Logan tries to win over Rory.

episodes.name: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting
episodes.title: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting
episodes.overview: Luke gets to know April. Rory tries to get the school newspaper published after the staff quits. All four Gilmores vent their frustrations.

episodes.name: You've Been Gilmored
episodes.title: You've Been Gilmored
episodes.overview: Lorelai brings Luke to dinner with her parents. When Rory becomes the new editor of the school paper, her roommate kicks her out of their apartment.

episodes.name: A Vineyard Valentine
episodes.title: A Vineyard Valentine
episodes.overview: Rory, Lorelai and their beaus spend Valentine's Day weekend on Martha's Vineyard. During their stay, Rory's boyfriend saves the day.

episodes.name: Bridesmaids Revisited
episodes.title: Bridesmaids Revisited
episodes.overview: Rory dazzles the crowd at a journalism panel, but the next day, she's devastated to learn how her boyfriend behaved during their breakup.

episodes.name: I'm OK, You're OK
episodes.title: I'm OK, You're OK
episodes.overview: Rory forgives her beau. Luke's girlfriend is secretly upset when he spends a few days with April. Rory does some spying on her mother's behalf.

episodes.name: The Real Paul Anka
episodes.title: The Real Paul Anka
episodes.overview: Unhappy because Rory hasn't really forgiven him, Logan takes off with his friends. Rory runs into Luke and April at a bookstore in Philadelphia.

episodes.name: I Get A Sidekick Out of You
episodes.title: I Get A Sidekick Out of You
episodes.overview: After she and her mother scramble to accommodate an unexpected visitor, Lane takes a big step in her life. Lorelai gives in to self-pity.

episodes.name: Super Cool Party People
episodes.title: Super Cool Party People
episodes.overview: When Luke plans a birthday party for April at the diner, Lorelai wants to help and is hurt that Luke thinks it's too soon for her to meet April.

episodes.name: Driving Miss Gilmore
episodes.title: Driving Miss Gilmore
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Emily while she's unable to see after minor eye surgery. Rory takes charge of Logan's recovery when he returns home.

episodes.name: Partings
episodes.title: Partings
episodes.overview: Rory throws a graduation party for Logan, but their time together is bittersweet. Lorelai delivers an ultimatum to Luke.

episodes.name: The Long Morrow
episodes.title: The Long Morrow
episodes.overview: Lorelai is mortified when she wakes up with an unexpected bedfellow. Rory is puzzled by Logan's going-away present.

episodes.name: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopee
episodes.title: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopee
episodes.overview: Rory is upset when she has to cancel a long-planned trip to Asia, so Lorelai turns her house into an Asian-themed wonderland.

episodes.name: Lorelai's First Cotillion
episodes.title: Lorelai's First Cotillion
episodes.overview: Lorelai realizes her parents aren't as terrible as she thought. Rory's long-distance relationship proves to be a struggle.

episodes.name: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous
episodes.title: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous
episodes.overview: Lorelai is having trouble fully committing to her current relationship. A relative comes to stay with Luke.

episodes.name: The Great Stink
episodes.title: The Great Stink
episodes.overview: Rory is thrilled when her beau comes to town on business but realizes during a dinner with his colleagues that she has no connection to his new world.

episodes.name: Go, Bulldogs!
episodes.title: Go, Bulldogs!
episodes.overview: Christopher treats Rory's college newspaper co-workers to lunch, but the meal ends abruptly when Rory insists they cover a breaking story.

episodes.name: French Twist
episodes.title: French Twist
episodes.overview: Christopher and Lorelai take Gigi to visit Sherry. Rory's tenure as editor-in-chief of the university newspaper comes to an end.

episodes.name: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium
episodes.title: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium
episodes.overview: Rory initially pretends to be thrilled about Lorelai's announcement, but later lets her mother know how upset she is when they're alone.

episodes.name: Knit, People, Knit!
episodes.title: Knit, People, Knit!
episodes.overview: Christopher's well-intentioned gesture at Stars Hollow's knit-a-thon brings the event to an early end.

episodes.name: Merry Fisticuffs
episodes.title: Merry Fisticuffs
episodes.overview: When Christopher witnesses a sweet moment between a couple, he becomes concerned about his partner's commitment to him.

episodes.name: Santa's Secret Stuff
episodes.title: Santa's Secret Stuff
episodes.overview: Luke asks Lorelai to write a character reference letter for his court case. Lorelai, Christopher and Rory have a late but extravagant Christmas.

episodes.name: To Whom It May Concern
episodes.title: To Whom It May Concern
episodes.overview: Sookie acts strangely. Luke attends his court case hearing. Lorelai is confronted about the character reference letter she wrote for Luke.

episodes.name: I'd Rather Be In Philadelphia
episodes.title: I'd Rather Be In Philadelphia
episodes.overview: During a family emergency, Lorelai can't reach Christopher. Meanwhile, Logan and Luke drop everything to support Rory, Lorelai, Richard and Emily.

episodes.name: Farewell, My Pet
episodes.title: Farewell, My Pet
episodes.overview: Rory has a crush on the teacher filling in for Richard. Christopher and Lorelai talk about their current relationship with each other.

episodes.name: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar
episodes.title: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Emily organize domestic affairs but has trouble revealing the current state of her love life. Rory attends a birthday dinner for Logan.

episodes.name: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?
episodes.title: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?
episodes.overview: Rory has an interview. Lorelai must settle a fight between Lane and her mother. Logan reveals a failure to Rory.

episodes.name: Gilmore Girls Only
episodes.title: Gilmore Girls Only
episodes.overview: Lorelai, Rory and Emily go on a road trip to attend the wedding of an old friend. Someone makes a surprise appearance, asking Rory to forgive him.

episodes.name: Hay Bale Maze
episodes.title: Hay Bale Maze
episodes.overview: Rory shows her boyfriend around Stars Hollow, while Lorelai worries he's too irresponsible. Lorelai and Luke admit they both made mistakes.

episodes.name: It's Just Like Riding a Bike
episodes.title: It's Just Like Riding a Bike
episodes.overview: After an awkward encounter, Lorelai and Luke start fighting, which Lorelai takes as a good sign. Rory gets a letter that impacts her future plans.

episodes.name: Lorelai? Lorelai?
episodes.title: Lorelai? Lorelai?
episodes.overview: Rory has a scary dream about what lies ahead for her. A visitor discusses Rory's future with Lorelai. Lorelai pours her heart out on karaoke night.

episodes.name: Unto The Breach
episodes.title: Unto The Breach
episodes.overview: Emily and Richard host a graduation party for Rory. Lorelai and Christopher are relieved to find they can still be friends. Logan surprises Rory.

episodes.name: Bon Voyage
episodes.title: Bon Voyage
episodes.overview: In this series finale, Rory makes a sudden change in her summer plans, and Luke enlists everyone in Stars Hollow to throw her a farewell party.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: When Rory is accepted to attend a prestigious prep school, Lorelai must swallow her pride and ask her wealthy parents for help paying the tuition.

episodes.name: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton
episodes.overview: Rory's first day at Chilton doesn't go smoothly: First, Lorelai's attire offends Emily and the headmaster; then Rory meets some obnoxious classmates.

episodes.name: Kill Me Now
episodes.title: Kill Me Now
episodes.overview: When Rory and Richard bond during a day of golf at the club, Lorelai feels jealous of Rory's deepening connection with her grandparents.

episodes.name: The Deer Hunters
episodes.title: The Deer Hunters
episodes.overview: After Rory receives a bad grade on her English paper, Lorelai helps her cram for a big Shakespeare exam – but catastrophe strikes on test day.

episodes.name: Cinnamon's Wake
episodes.title: Cinnamon's Wake
episodes.overview: Lorelai admits she has feelings for someone. Meanwhile, Rory has a budding relationship of her own that is moving forward.

episodes.name: Rory's Birthday Parties
episodes.title: Rory's Birthday Parties
episodes.overview: Rory clashes with Emily when Emily plans a formal birthday party for her. Meanwhile, Lorelai organizes a casual get-together to celebrate.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.title: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Rory shares a romantic moment with Dean, but doesn't tell Lorelai. When Lorelai hears about it from Mrs. Kim, she invites Dean over for movie night.

episodes.name: Love and War and Snow
episodes.title: Love and War and Snow
episodes.overview: Snow strands Rory at her grandparents' home, while Lorelai spends the day with her beau. Meanwhile, Lane misses Rory and comes to visit.

episodes.name: Rory's Dance
episodes.title: Rory's Dance
episodes.overview: Rory attends her first dance with Dean but they get home late, causing Emily and Lorelai to fight over Lorelai's mothering skills.

episodes.name: Forgiveness and Stuff
episodes.title: Forgiveness and Stuff
episodes.overview: Misfortune strikes at the Gilmores' Christmas party. Dean assures Lorelai that nothing improper happened the night he and Rory fell asleep together.

episodes.name: Paris is Burning
episodes.title: Paris is Burning
episodes.overview: After Paris causes a scandal by exposing the relationship between a parent and a teacher, she is confronted.

episodes.name: Double Date
episodes.title: Double Date
episodes.overview: Lorelai goes on a hellish double date with Sookie, Jackson and Jackson's odd cousin. Meanwhile, Rory double dates with Dean, Lane and Dean's friend.

episodes.name: Concert Interruptus
episodes.title: Concert Interruptus
episodes.overview: Trouble ensues when Rory takes her friends to a Bangles concert in New York. Lorelai learns something about Luke's romantic past.

episodes.name: That Damn Donna Reed
episodes.title: That Damn Donna Reed
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean argue about women's roles after watching "The Donna Reed Show." Emily makes Lorelai face her feelings.

episodes.name: Christopher Returns
episodes.title: Christopher Returns
episodes.overview: Rory's father returns, causing tension in Emily and Richard's house – and forcing Lorelai to make a big decision about her family's future.

episodes.name: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers
episodes.title: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean celebrate their three-month anniversary, but things don't go as planned. Luke's ex-girlfriend Rachel arrives in town.

episodes.name: The Breakup, Part 2
episodes.title: The Breakup, Part 2
episodes.overview: After recent events, Rory keeps busy, refusing to give in to self-pity. Meanwhile, Stars Hollow's residents rally around her, much to her dismay.

episodes.name: The Third Lorelai
episodes.title: The Third Lorelai
episodes.overview: When Lorelai's grandmother offers a trust fund for Rory's education, Emily fears losing contact with a financially independent Lorelai and Rory.

episodes.name: Emily in Wonderland
episodes.title: Emily in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Emily is horrified when she sees the place where Lorelai and Rory first lived, so she sets out to create a perfect bedroom for Rory in her house.

episodes.name: P.S. I Lo...
episodes.title: P.S. I Lo...
episodes.overview: Still upset over recent events, Rory becomes angry with Lorelai, who didn't tell her that she is dating again.

episodes.name: Love, Daisies and Troubadours
episodes.title: Love, Daisies and Troubadours
episodes.overview: Rory finally tells Dean the truth about how she feels about him. Sensing something between Lorelai and Luke, Rachel makes a decision.

episodes.name: Sadie, Sadie...
episodes.title: Sadie, Sadie...
episodes.overview: Lorelai makes a big decision, but when Emily hears about it from someone else, she's hurt and angry that Lorelai didn't bother to tell her.

episodes.name: Hammers and Veils
episodes.title: Hammers and Veils
episodes.overview: Rory's sudden flurry of extracurricular activity strains her relationship with Dean. Emily is cold when Lorelai finally reveals her big news.

episodes.name: Red Light on the Wedding Night
episodes.title: Red Light on the Wedding Night
episodes.overview: During a wild party, Lorelai impulsively calls someone, and their conversation gives her second thoughts about her plans.

episodes.name: The Road Trip to Harvard
episodes.title: The Road Trip to Harvard
episodes.overview: With her big plans canceled, Lorelai is eager to escape the reactions of everyone in Stars Hollow, so she and Rory take off on a road trip.

episodes.name: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy
episodes.title: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy
episodes.overview: Lorelai tries to dissuade Luke from allowing his relative to live with him. Rory finds herself attracted to another boy.

episodes.name: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore
episodes.title: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore
episodes.overview: Rory surprises everyone by agreeing to make her debut at a ball, and Lorelai finds herself attracted to a changed man.

episodes.name: Like Mother, Like Daughter
episodes.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
episodes.overview: Advised to become more social at Chilton, Rory winds up in the most popular school clique, while Lorelai helps with a fundraising fashion show.

episodes.name: The Ins and Outs of Inns
episodes.title: The Ins and Outs of Inns
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie have the first fight of their long friendship when Lorelai panics and decides their dream of opening an inn together will fail.

episodes.name: Run Away, Little Boy
episodes.title: Run Away, Little Boy
episodes.overview: When Rory and her classmate Tristan are cast as Romeo and Juliet in a school play, a jealous Dean insists on attending every rehearsal.

episodes.name: The Bracebridge Dinner
episodes.title: The Bracebridge Dinner
episodes.overview: While Rory struggles to keep the budding rivalry between Dean and Jess under control, Lorelai invites most of Stars Hollow to an elaborate feast.

episodes.name: Secrets and Loans
episodes.title: Secrets and Loans
episodes.overview: Lorelai can't afford to repair her home's extensive termite damage but becomes angry when Rory involves Emily, who again offers Lorelai a loan.

episodes.name: Richard in Stars Hollow
episodes.title: Richard in Stars Hollow
episodes.overview: Newly retired Richard is driving Emily crazy, so Lorelai agrees to take her father for a day in Stars Hollow, where he annoys both Lorelai and Rory.

episodes.name: A-Tisket, A-Tasket
episodes.title: A-Tisket, A-Tasket
episodes.overview: The annual Stars Hollow Picnic Basket Auction causes romantic complications when Jess outbids Dean to win a picnic lunch date with Rory.

episodes.name: It Should've Been Lorelai
episodes.title: It Should've Been Lorelai
episodes.overview: Christopher brings a visitor to Stars Hollow who wants to get to know Rory. Emily is furious that Lorelai isn't trying to win Christopher back.

episodes.name: Lost & Found
episodes.title: Lost & Found
episodes.overview: Rory panics when she realizes she's lost the bracelet Dean made for her. When Lorelai spots someone in Rory's room, she makes accusations of theft.

episodes.name: There's the Rub
episodes.title: There's the Rub
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Emily's weekend at a spa doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Rory's night alone becomes difficult when Paris, Jess and Dean arrive.

episodes.name: Dead Uncles & Vegetables
episodes.title: Dead Uncles & Vegetables
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory help out at the diner while Luke makes funeral arrangements. Emily goes overboard helping to plan a wedding.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle Again
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again
episodes.overview: After helping Rory with her project for Chilton's annual business fair, Richard realizes he's tired of retirement and wants to start a second career.

episodes.name: Teach Me Tonight
episodes.title: Teach Me Tonight
episodes.overview: As a favor to Luke, Rory tutors Jess, but during their first study session, Jess convinces Rory to go on a quick outing with him.

episodes.name: Help Wanted
episodes.title: Help Wanted
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Richard establish a consulting business. Rory becomes angry that everyone blames Jess for what happened to her.

episodes.name: Lorelai's Graduation Day
episodes.title: Lorelai's Graduation Day
episodes.overview: Lorelai is about to graduate from business school, so Rory secretly invites guests to her graduation ceremony. Rory makes a trip to New York.

episodes.name: I Can't Get Started
episodes.title: I Can't Get Started
episodes.overview: On the day before the wedding, Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Meanwhile, Rory is thrilled when a familiar face returns to Stars Hollow.

episodes.name: Those Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days
episodes.title: Those Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days
episodes.overview: Back from a summer internship in Washington, D.C., Rory finds herself torn between Dean and Jess. Meanwhile, Lorelai questions her future.

episodes.name: Haunted Leg
episodes.title: Haunted Leg
episodes.overview: Emily's attempts to reunite Christopher with Lorelai and Rory result in an ugly confrontation between Rory and Christopher.

episodes.name: Application Anxiety
episodes.title: Application Anxiety
episodes.overview: After a Harvard application arrives, Rory and Lorelai seek advice. Meanwhile, Lane places an ad and becomes enamored with a respondent.

episodes.name: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes
episodes.title: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes
episodes.overview: Things get ugly when Lorelai speaks at the high school's career day. To rebel against her conservative mother, Lane does something drastic.

episodes.name: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis
episodes.title: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis
episodes.overview: After a disastrous date with a man she met at an auction organized by Emily, Lorelai tries to cancel the second date, despite her parents' objections.

episodes.name: Take the Deviled Eggs...
episodes.title: Take the Deviled Eggs...
episodes.overview: When Lorelai winds up attending a social event with Rory, she learns more about Christopher's life than she wanted to know.

episodes.name: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?
episodes.title: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?
episodes.overview: Lorelai forces Rory to be her partner at the Stars Hollow dance marathon, where Rory can't stop arguing with a boy – and another definitely notices.

episodes.name: Let the Games Begin
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin
episodes.overview: Lorelai, Rory, Richard and Emily visit Richard's alma mater, but Richard causes trouble by secretly making some arrangements in advance.

episodes.name: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving
episodes.title: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory have four Thanksgivings when they stop for celebrations with Lane, Sookie and Luke on the way to dinner with Richard and Emily.

episodes.name: That'll Do, Pig
episodes.title: That'll Do, Pig
episodes.overview: Lorelai misses the town carnival when a visitor arrives. Rory's beau won't take her to the carnival – until he learns she might go with another boy.

episodes.name: I Solemnly Swear...
episodes.title: I Solemnly Swear...
episodes.overview: A classmate convinces Paris that Rory has been plotting against her. Meanwhile, Emily is sued by a former maid, and Lorelai meets an interesting man.

episodes.name: Lorelai Out of Water
episodes.title: Lorelai Out of Water
episodes.overview: Lorelai gets an angling lesson from Luke before her fishing date with her new beau. Meanwhile, the political battle between Rory and Paris escalates.

episodes.name: Dear Emily and Richard
episodes.title: Dear Emily and Richard
episodes.overview: When Sherry goes into labor and asks Rory to stay with her at the hospital, Lorelai reminisces about the day Rory was born.

episodes.name: Swan Song
episodes.title: Swan Song
episodes.overview: Lorelai goes away with her boyfriend for a weekend in New York, but she worries about leaving Rory and her boyfriend together.

episodes.name: Face-Off
episodes.title: Face-Off
episodes.overview: Tired of waiting for her boyfriend to call and make plans for the weekend, Rory goes to a hockey game with Lane, where she sees a familiar face.

episodes.name: The Big One
episodes.title: The Big One
episodes.overview: Rory and Paris compete to give a speech at a school celebration. Meanwhile, Lorelai shares a passionate kiss with someone unexpected.

episodes.name: A Tale of Poes and Fire
episodes.title: A Tale of Poes and Fire
episodes.overview: When a meeting of the Edgar Allan Poe Society at her inn is interrupted by a disaster, Lorelai must find rooms for the guests at homes around town.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Baby
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Baby
episodes.overview: While Lorelai deals with the aftermath at the inn, Rory schemes to give her mom a special birthday party, complete with a gigantic surprise.

episodes.name: Keg! Max!
episodes.title: Keg! Max!
episodes.overview: Rory makes plans to attend the prom. Lane's rock band debuts at a big party, where longstanding animosities finally explode.

episodes.name: Say Goodnight, Gracie
episodes.title: Say Goodnight, Gracie
episodes.overview: After the brawl at her band's debut, Lane is in trouble with her mother. Later, Jess receives a visitor at the diner.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Son
episodes.title: Here Comes the Son
episodes.overview: Jess travels across the country for a visit. Rory helps Emily choose an outfit for Rory's graduation, resulting in a conflict with Lorelai.

episodes.name: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio
episodes.title: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai prepare for Rory's graduation from Chilton. But major developments involving the inn threaten to dampen the festivities.

episodes.name: Ballrooms and Biscotti
episodes.title: Ballrooms and Biscotti
episodes.overview: After returning from a summer of backpacking through Europe, Rory and Lorelai frantically prepare for Rory's move to college.

episodes.name: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Rory move into her dorm, where she meets an odd new roommate, and learns that she will also be sharing her room with a familiar face.

episodes.name: The Hobbit, the Sofa, and Digger Stiles
episodes.title: The Hobbit, the Sofa, and Digger Stiles
episodes.overview: Emily redecorates Rory's dorm room without her permission. Lorelai and Sookie cater a kids' birthday party with a "Lord of the Rings" theme.

episodes.name: Chicken or Beef?
episodes.title: Chicken or Beef?
episodes.overview: While visiting Stars Hollow for the weekend, Rory encounters Dean, who awkwardly invites her to an event the next day.

episodes.name: The Fundamental Things Apply
episodes.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
episodes.overview: Lorelai struggles to hide details of her life from Emily. Rory discovers that college dating isn't easy. Lorelai invites Luke over for movie night.

episodes.name: An Affair to Remember
episodes.title: An Affair to Remember
episodes.overview: Emily hires Lorelai and Sookie to cater an elaborate launch party for Richard's new company, but insists they prove that they are worthy of her trust.

episodes.name: The Festival of Living Art
episodes.title: The Festival of Living Art
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai participate in a Stars Hollow event in which the townspeople dress up and present tableaux imitating famous paintings.

episodes.name: Die, Jerk
episodes.title: Die, Jerk
episodes.overview: Rory tries to spice up her articles for the student newspaper. Luke admits to Lorelai that he is revisiting a past relationship.

episodes.name: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out
episodes.title: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out
episodes.overview: Emily realizes that Richard has been secretly meeting someone for lunch for years. Lorelai accepts an invitation to dinner.

episodes.name: The Nanny and the Professor
episodes.title: The Nanny and the Professor
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie renovate their inn. Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Rory is irritated by Paris's new relationship.

episodes.name: In the Clamor and the Clangor
episodes.title: In the Clamor and the Clangor
episodes.overview: Lorelai is upset that Luke has gotten an apartment in another town. Rory learns that a guy she likes has been spreading false information about her.

episodes.name: A Family Matter
episodes.title: A Family Matter
episodes.overview: Luke is wary when his sister comes to town. Lorelai hesitates to tell her parents about her new beau. Paris's affair gets serious.

episodes.name: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels
episodes.title: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels
episodes.overview: Rory crosses paths with Jess in Stars Hollow. Luke's sister visits Stars Hollow and introduces her new boyfriend to her brother.

episodes.name: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais
episodes.title: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by her classwork, Rory confides in Dean, who's working on the construction crew at the Dragonfly Inn.

episodes.name: Scene in a Mall
episodes.title: Scene in a Mall
episodes.overview: Rory gets a glimpse of Dean's new life. When Lorelai and Rory spend a day at the mall, they run into Emily on a wild shopping spree.

episodes.name: The Reigning Lorelai
episodes.title: The Reigning Lorelai
episodes.overview: Richard is devastated by a sudden loss. Emily receives a shock when she finds an old letter that was written to Richard.

episodes.name: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist
episodes.title: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist
episodes.overview: Rory and Paris head south for their first spring break in Florida, where they run into a couple of their old pals from Chilton.

episodes.name: Tick, Tick, Tick, Boom!
episodes.title: Tick, Tick, Tick, Boom!
episodes.overview: Jason and Richard are sued. Rory is upset by a decision Dean has made. Dean is told to stop spending time with Rory.

episodes.name: Afterboom
episodes.title: Afterboom
episodes.overview: Lorelai confronts her father when she learns that he has cut business ties. Luke gives Lorelai an update on his love life.

episodes.name: Luke Can See Her Face
episodes.title: Luke Can See Her Face
episodes.overview: A self-help tape helps a depressed Luke realize who his soul mate is. Lorelai is stressed as the Dragonfly Inn's opening day approaches.

episodes.name: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights
episodes.title: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights
episodes.overview: Jess walks his mother down the aisle at her Renaissance-themed wedding. Luke asks his new love interest on a date. Dean confides in Rory.

episodes.name: Raincoats and Recipes
episodes.title: Raincoats and Recipes
episodes.overview: Lorelai invites friends and family to do a test run of the Dragonfly Inn opening. Two suitors pursue Lorelai.

episodes.name: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller
episodes.title: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai argue about a choice Rory made. Lorelai is happy in her new relationship. Emily and Rory plan to take a European trip.

episodes.name: A Messenger, Nothing More
episodes.title: A Messenger, Nothing More
episodes.overview: After Rory apologizes to Lorelai, she sends a letter from Europe, which has unintended consequences. Meanwhile, Luke returns home.

episodes.name: Written in the Stars
episodes.title: Written in the Stars
episodes.overview: Lorelai is a little offended that no one cares about her new relationship – until it becomes a topic of heated discussion at the town meeting.

episodes.name: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too
episodes.title: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too
episodes.overview: Rory and Dean meet alone to discuss where they stand with each other. Lorelai and Sookie manage Jackson's campaign for a town office.

episodes.name: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin!
episodes.title: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin!
episodes.overview: Wanting to smooth over her relationship with Dean, Lorelai suggests a night out with Luke and Rory – but the evening goes awry.

episodes.name: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant!
episodes.title: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant!
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Sookie are thrilled when a cultural icon starts frequenting the Dragonfly Inn dining room. Rory discovers an intriguing secret society.

episodes.name: You Jump, I Jump, Jack
episodes.title: You Jump, I Jump, Jack
episodes.overview: Logan takes Rory to a mysterious and elaborate event. After discovering that Lorelai has a new beau, Emily and Richard spend time with him.

episodes.name: The Party's Over
episodes.title: The Party's Over
episodes.overview: When Emily and Richard throw a party to introduce Rory to their alumni friends, she has a realization about her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Emily Says Hello
episodes.title: Emily Says Hello
episodes.overview: Rory and Lorelai plan to convince Richard and Emily to reconcile, but Emily dashes their hopes by making a bold announcement.

episodes.name: But Not as Cute as Pushkin
episodes.title: But Not as Cute as Pushkin
episodes.overview: Rory hosts a high school student who's considering the same university, but things don't go as planned. Lorelai and her beau have their first fight.

episodes.name: Women Of Questionable Morals
episodes.title: Women Of Questionable Morals
episodes.overview: When Christopher visits Rory at college, she rejects his attempt at reconciliation. Lorelai consoles him but doesn't tell her boyfriend where she was.

episodes.name: Come Home
episodes.title: Come Home
episodes.overview: Rory offers to help Logan write an article. When Richard sees Emily talking to a man she dated, he has an explosive reaction.

episodes.name: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues
episodes.overview: Lorelai and Rory throw Emily a party. Richard and Emily recommit to their marriage. Rory tells Logan what she wants from him.

episodes.name: Say Something
episodes.title: Say Something
episodes.overview: After the disastrous scene at her parents' recent social event, Lorelai begs her boyfriend not to give up on their relationship.

episodes.name: Jews and Chinese Food
episodes.title: Jews and Chinese Food
episodes.overview: Lorelai is upset about the recent turn of events. Luke builds sets for the elementary school play in hopes of seeing the costume designer.

episodes.name: So... Good Talk
episodes.title: So... Good Talk
episodes.overview: Richard and Emily return from their second honeymoon. Miserable Luke burns food and handles complaining customers by throwing them out of the diner.

episodes.name: Pulp Friction
episodes.title: Pulp Friction
episodes.overview: Rory regrets agreeing with her beau to date other people. Lorelai reunites with her boyfriend but remains cold toward Emily.

episodes.name: To Live and Let Diorama
episodes.title: To Live and Let Diorama
episodes.overview: Luke helps turn an old house into a museum. Lorelai says too much during an interview about the inn. Rory, Paris and Lane have boyfriend trouble.

episodes.name: But I'm a Gilmore
episodes.title: But I'm a Gilmore
episodes.overview: When Rory tells her beau she can't have a casual relationship with him, he gives her an unexpected response. Sookie finds herself confined to her bed.

episodes.name: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?
episodes.title: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?
episodes.overview: Rory begins her internship at one of Logan's father's newspapers. Emily and Richard fawn over Rory's boyfriend, but Lorelai is not as impressed.

episodes.name: Blame Booze and Melville
episodes.title: Blame Booze and Melville
episodes.overview: Rory is surprised by the performance review she receives from Logan's father. Luke's plan to buy the Twickham house is threatened by a competing bid.

episodes.name: A House Is Not a Home
episodes.title: A House Is Not a Home
episodes.overview: Lorelai rescues Rory after a night of reckless behavior. Shocked to hear her daughter's plans for the future, she turns to Luke for help.

episodes.name: New and Improved Lorelai
episodes.title: New and Improved Lorelai
episodes.overview: Luke responds to Lorelai. Rory faces legal consequences. Angry with Rory, Richard and Emily, Lorelai cuts off ties with them.

episodes.name: Fight Face
episodes.title: Fight Face
episodes.overview: Rory winds up in a fight while performing community service. Lorelai gets a dog. Luke and Lorelai decide to renovate Lorelai's house.

episodes.name: The UnGraduate
episodes.title: The UnGraduate
