episodes.overview: Rory takes a job at Emily's Daughters of the American Revolution office and serves as her grandmother's spy. Lorelai won't commit to a date.

episodes.name: Always a Godmother, Never a God
episodes.title: Always a Godmother, Never a God
episodes.overview: Sookie hopes to reconcile the estranged Gilmore girls by asking both Lorelai and Rory to be godparents to her kids, but things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: We've Got Magic to Do
episodes.title: We've Got Magic to Do
episodes.overview: After two separate confrontations with the Huntzbergers at a D.A.R. party, Richard and Emily realize Lorelai was right about their treatment of Rory.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Doll House
episodes.title: Welcome to the Doll House
episodes.overview: After asking Logan about Rory's future plans, Richard admits it was a mistake to let Rory make rash decisions and discusses the matter with Lorelai.

episodes.name: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number
episodes.title: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number
episodes.overview: Both Lorelai and Rory are saddened that their estrangement will keep them from spending Rory's 21st birthday the way they had always planned.

episodes.name: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out
episodes.title: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out
episodes.overview: When her former boyfriend visits and reveals an amazing success, Rory begins rethinking the choices she's made with her life.

episodes.name: The Prodigal Daughter Returns
episodes.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns
episodes.overview: After months of estrangement, Lorelai and Rory make their first move toward reconciliation. Luke gets a big surprise but conceals it from Lorelai.

episodes.name: He's Slippin’ ‘Em Bread... Dig?
episodes.title: He's Slippin’ ‘Em Bread... Dig?
episodes.overview: Rory's long-absent father reappears in her and Lorelai's lives, casting uncertainty on what this will mean for Lorelai's current relationship.

episodes.name: The Perfect Dress
episodes.title: The Perfect Dress
episodes.overview: Wanting to get to know his newly discovered relative, Luke makes a visit. Lorelai sets a date but has a feeling something's not right.

episodes.name: Just Like Gwen and Gavin
episodes.title: Just Like Gwen and Gavin
episodes.overview: Lorelai finds out about Luke's secret, but not from Luke. She tries to be supportive, but Luke's reaction hurts her. Logan tries to win over Rory.

episodes.name: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting
episodes.title: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting
episodes.overview: Luke gets to know April. Rory tries to get the school newspaper published after the staff quits. All four Gilmores vent their frustrations.

episodes.name: You've Been Gilmored
episodes.title: You've Been Gilmored
episodes.overview: Lorelai brings Luke to dinner with her parents. When Rory becomes the new editor of the school paper, her roommate kicks her out of their apartment.

episodes.name: A Vineyard Valentine
episodes.title: A Vineyard Valentine
episodes.overview: Rory, Lorelai and their beaus spend Valentine's Day weekend on Martha's Vineyard. During their stay, Rory's boyfriend saves the day.

episodes.name: Bridesmaids Revisited
episodes.title: Bridesmaids Revisited
episodes.overview: Rory dazzles the crowd at a journalism panel, but the next day, she's devastated to learn how her boyfriend behaved during their breakup.

episodes.name: I'm OK, You're OK
episodes.title: I'm OK, You're OK
episodes.overview: Rory forgives her beau. Luke's girlfriend is secretly upset when he spends a few days with April. Rory does some spying on her mother's behalf.

episodes.name: The Real Paul Anka
episodes.title: The Real Paul Anka
episodes.overview: Unhappy because Rory hasn't really forgiven him, Logan takes off with his friends. Rory runs into Luke and April at a bookstore in Philadelphia.

episodes.name: I Get A Sidekick Out of You
episodes.title: I Get A Sidekick Out of You
episodes.overview: After she and her mother scramble to accommodate an unexpected visitor, Lane takes a big step in her life. Lorelai gives in to self-pity.

episodes.name: Super Cool Party People
episodes.title: Super Cool Party People
episodes.overview: When Luke plans a birthday party for April at the diner, Lorelai wants to help and is hurt that Luke thinks it's too soon for her to meet April.

episodes.name: Driving Miss Gilmore
episodes.title: Driving Miss Gilmore
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Emily while she's unable to see after minor eye surgery. Rory takes charge of Logan's recovery when he returns home.

episodes.name: Partings
episodes.title: Partings
episodes.overview: Rory throws a graduation party for Logan, but their time together is bittersweet. Lorelai delivers an ultimatum to Luke.

episodes.name: The Long Morrow
episodes.title: The Long Morrow
episodes.overview: Lorelai is mortified when she wakes up with an unexpected bedfellow. Rory is puzzled by Logan's going-away present.

episodes.name: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopee
episodes.title: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopee
episodes.overview: Rory is upset when she has to cancel a long-planned trip to Asia, so Lorelai turns her house into an Asian-themed wonderland.

episodes.name: Lorelai's First Cotillion
episodes.title: Lorelai's First Cotillion
episodes.overview: Lorelai realizes her parents aren't as terrible as she thought. Rory's long-distance relationship proves to be a struggle.

episodes.name: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous
episodes.title: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous
episodes.overview: Lorelai is having trouble fully committing to her current relationship. A relative comes to stay with Luke.

episodes.name: The Great Stink
episodes.title: The Great Stink
episodes.overview: Rory is thrilled when her beau comes to town on business but realizes during a dinner with his colleagues that she has no connection to his new world.

episodes.name: Go, Bulldogs!
episodes.title: Go, Bulldogs!
episodes.overview: Christopher treats Rory's college newspaper co-workers to lunch, but the meal ends abruptly when Rory insists they cover a breaking story.

episodes.name: French Twist
episodes.title: French Twist
episodes.overview: Christopher and Lorelai take Gigi to visit Sherry. Rory's tenure as editor-in-chief of the university newspaper comes to an end.

episodes.name: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium
episodes.title: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium
episodes.overview: Rory initially pretends to be thrilled about Lorelai's announcement, but later lets her mother know how upset she is when they're alone.

episodes.name: Knit, People, Knit!
episodes.title: Knit, People, Knit!
episodes.overview: Christopher's well-intentioned gesture at Stars Hollow's knit-a-thon brings the event to an early end.

episodes.name: Merry Fisticuffs
episodes.title: Merry Fisticuffs
episodes.overview: When Christopher witnesses a sweet moment between a couple, he becomes concerned about his partner's commitment to him.

episodes.name: Santa's Secret Stuff
episodes.title: Santa's Secret Stuff
episodes.overview: Luke asks Lorelai to write a character reference letter for his court case. Lorelai, Christopher and Rory have a late but extravagant Christmas.

episodes.name: To Whom It May Concern
episodes.title: To Whom It May Concern
episodes.overview: Sookie acts strangely. Luke attends his court case hearing. Lorelai is confronted about the character reference letter she wrote for Luke.

episodes.name: I'd Rather Be In Philadelphia
episodes.title: I'd Rather Be In Philadelphia
episodes.overview: During a family emergency, Lorelai can't reach Christopher. Meanwhile, Logan and Luke drop everything to support Rory, Lorelai, Richard and Emily.

episodes.name: Farewell, My Pet
episodes.title: Farewell, My Pet
episodes.overview: Rory has a crush on the teacher filling in for Richard. Christopher and Lorelai talk about their current relationship with each other.

episodes.name: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar
episodes.title: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar
episodes.overview: Lorelai helps Emily organize domestic affairs but has trouble revealing the current state of her love life. Rory attends a birthday dinner for Logan.

episodes.name: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?
episodes.title: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?
episodes.overview: Rory has an interview. Lorelai must settle a fight between Lane and her mother. Logan reveals a failure to Rory.

episodes.name: Gilmore Girls Only
episodes.title: Gilmore Girls Only
episodes.overview: Lorelai, Rory and Emily go on a road trip to attend the wedding of an old friend. Someone makes a surprise appearance, asking Rory to forgive him.

episodes.name: Hay Bale Maze
episodes.title: Hay Bale Maze
episodes.overview: Rory shows her boyfriend around Stars Hollow, while Lorelai worries he's too irresponsible. Lorelai and Luke admit they both made mistakes.

episodes.name: It's Just Like Riding a Bike
episodes.title: It's Just Like Riding a Bike
episodes.overview: After an awkward encounter, Lorelai and Luke start fighting, which Lorelai takes as a good sign. Rory gets a letter that impacts her future plans.

episodes.name: Lorelai? Lorelai?
episodes.title: Lorelai? Lorelai?
episodes.overview: Rory has a scary dream about what lies ahead for her. A visitor discusses Rory's future with Lorelai. Lorelai pours her heart out on karaoke night.

episodes.name: Unto The Breach
episodes.title: Unto The Breach
episodes.overview: Emily and Richard host a graduation party for Rory. Lorelai and Christopher are relieved to find they can still be friends. Logan surprises Rory.

episodes.name: Bon Voyage
episodes.title: Bon Voyage
episodes.overview: In this series finale, Rory makes a sudden change in her summer plans, and Luke enlists everyone in Stars Hollow to throw her a farewell party.

items.title: Friday Night Lights
items.overview: The trials and triumphs of life in the small town of Dillon, Texas, where high school football is everything.

media.title: Friday Night Lights
media.overview: The trials and triumphs of life in the small town of Dillon, Texas, where high school football is everything.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: A newcomer coach Eric Taylor finds himself helming a promising high school football team, the Dillon Panthers, that has a real chance to make it to the top.

episodes.name: Eyes Wide Open
episodes.title: Eyes Wide Open
episodes.overview: As the team pulls together and tries to help Matt get used to his new role as quarterback after Jason's injury, Lyla offers her support to Tim.Jason learns about the extent of his injury, and Tami gets a job as the school guidance counselor.

episodes.name: Wind Sprints
episodes.title: Wind Sprints
episodes.overview: The situation in town begins to get ugly as Coach Taylor and his family is forced to endure heat from a difficult loss against the San Marco HS Rattlers.Tim and Tyra break up after he confronts her about Smash, and Lyla, after having an argument with Jason, vents her anger onto Tim.

episodes.name: Who's Your Daddy
episodes.title: Who's Your Daddy
episodes.overview: As the Panthers prepare for a match against the Tigers, who are their biggest rival, Jason's new roommate tries to help him understand the potential he has for recovery.Lyla tells Tim of her regrets about what happened between them, and Matt hits an all-time low.

episodes.name: Git 'Er Done
episodes.title: Git 'Er Done
episodes.overview: The big game against the Tigers drawing closer, Coach Taylor must decide between Matt and the self-assured recruit Ray "Voodoo" Tatum for the starting quarterback. The feelings between Tim and Lyla grow stronger. Jason's newly-found motivation strives him to begin the rehab.

episodes.name: El Accidente
episodes.title: El Accidente
episodes.overview:
Ray Tatum faces the blame of his team mates after Panthers' win in the game last week might be overturned.

Defensive tackle Bobby Reyes is arrested by the police during a practice for beating a student. Coach Taylor and Buddy Garrity are questioned by the Texas High School athletic administration.Lyla and Tim surprise Jason by taking him to the lake.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.title: Homecoming
episodes.overview: As the Panthers get ready to face the dominating Laribee Lions, the 2000 State Champ quarterback, Lucas Mize is set to join the team.Smash catches his chance to convince a college scout of his talents. A focused Tim quits drinking. Jason's suspicions of Lyla and Tim's affair grow. Tyra and Billy set up an after game homecoming party.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.title: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: Julie thinks about going on a date with Matt. A discouraged Smash turns to foul play to improve his on-pitch performance. Cheered by Lyla and Tim, Jason has his first quad rugby game. A dinner turns into a fight for Coach Taylor, Tami, Riggins and his brother.

episodes.name: Full Hearts
episodes.title: Full Hearts
episodes.overview: Smash continues to go the extreme to improve his performance. Rumors begin to spread about Tim and Lyla's relationship. Julie and Matt attempt to go out on a date but it is cursed from the beginning.The Panthers are in much anticipation for their upcoming game against the Gatling High.

episodes.name: It's Different for Girls
episodes.title: It's Different for Girls
episodes.overview: The cheerleaders prepare for Championship Classic. Lyla is picked on when people find out about her and Riggins. Coach Taylor tries to keep Matt and Julie apart. Jason goes home after being released from rehab.

episodes.name: Nevermind
episodes.title: Nevermind
episodes.overview: The Panthers are preparing for another game they can't lose. Matt's father comes back from Iraq but his mother's condition is difficult to take in.Tami Taylor sees Tim Riggins regarding his grades. She believes he's not doing his homework by himself and asks Landry to tutor him for his next oral exam. If he doesn't pass, he won't play in the football team.

episodes.name: What to Do While You're Waiting
episodes.title: What to Do While You're Waiting
episodes.overview: The Panther's fate is hung up on the result of a game between two other teams and there is nothing they can do about it.Meanwhile, there is tension at the Street's house because of the lawsuit they introduced against Coach Taylor.Matt's father has a hard time adjusting back to real life.

episodes.name: Little Girl I Wanna Marry You
episodes.title: Little Girl I Wanna Marry You
episodes.overview: The Panthers have only one more game to win in order to qualify for the play-offs. Smash's mother discovers something that could end his football dreams.

episodes.name: Upping the Ante
episodes.title: Upping the Ante
episodes.overview: The Panthers prepare for their first playoff game.Coach Taylor gets distracted as he has to come up with a solution to Smash's use of drugs. Tyra and Julie befriend while Riggins bonds with his alienated father.Buddy learns about Jason and Lyla's engagement.

episodes.name: Blinders
episodes.title: Blinders
episodes.overview: The Panthers savor their crucial playoff-win-until race issues emerge and sorely test their bond after Mac makes racial statements.Tami frowns upon Julie's newfound friendship with Tyra. The girls play a powder-puff football game.

episodes.name: Black Eyes & Broken Hearts
episodes.title: Black Eyes & Broken Hearts
episodes.overview: Due to racial comments from Coach Mac, the black players on the team refuse to play unless he is sacked.Julie is sucked deeper into the vortex as her friendship with Tyra develops. Matt tries to win Julie back.

episodes.name: I Think We Should Have Sex
episodes.title: I Think We Should Have Sex
episodes.overview: After Julie reveals to Matt that she wants to have sex with him, Matt feels the need to put together something special. Tim clashes with his father.The Panthers are into the next round of the playoffs and looking solid.

episodes.name: Extended Families
episodes.title: Extended Families
episodes.overview: Lyla makes a surprise visit to the quad rugby camp where Jason is playing at, but she doesn't find the comfort she came looking for.Buddy Garrity's affair with Tyra's mother comes out. Consequently, Buddy decides to move in with the Taylors.Smash becomes suspicious about Waverly when she goes for a midnight swim with him.

episodes.name: Ch-Ch-Ch-Ch-Changes
episodes.title: Ch-Ch-Ch-Ch-Changes
episodes.overview: With TMU trying to recruit Coach Taylor, Julie insists that she will not be moved away from Matt and Dillon. The quad rugby recruiters in Austin deliver some bad news to Jason. Riggins becomes friends with a single mother and her son.

episodes.name: Mud Bowl
episodes.title: Mud Bowl
episodes.overview: An chemical spill near Dillon High School forces Coach Taylor and the Panthers to seek another facility in which to play the crucial State Semi-Final game.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview:
Coach Taylor buckles under the pressure from Texas Methodist University. The news of his decision is not taken lightly by his family.

Riggins faces the impending consequences of his relationship. Landry wonders whether he should tell someone about Tyra's situation.

episodes.name: State
episodes.title: State
episodes.overview:
The rumors about Coach Taylor leaving the team at the end of the season get a boost when an inside source decides to speak up.

Meanwhile, the Panthers are preparing themselves for the state championship.

episodes.name: Last Days of Summer
episodes.title: Last Days of Summer
episodes.overview: Changes in the team force Dillon Panthers to work harder than ever before to achieve the same level of success they had last season. Losing Coach Taylor to TMU might prove to be their biggest setback. Tyra gets a shock visitor. Matt and Landry struggle with their everyday life, as it is not what they expected.

episodes.name: Bad Ideas
episodes.title: Bad Ideas
episodes.overview: So many things have changed at Dillon High and the first day of school is the real test. Matt stands by as his world comes crashing down, while Landry still copes to make sense of his. All eyes seem to be focusing on Smash, while Tami tries to adjust to having a teenager and a newborn.

episodes.name: Are You Ready for Friday Night?
episodes.title: Are You Ready for Friday Night?
episodes.overview: Matt and Smash have a hard time listening to their coach as they prepare for their first game of the new season. Coach Taylor heads back to Dillon to check on his family and finds out just what is happening to the Panthers since he's left.

episodes.name: Backfire
episodes.title: Backfire
episodes.overview: Tim and Jason go to Mexico as Street hopes to explore experimental surgery. Riggins, who is worried about Street, turns to Lyla Garrity, who's busy helping a newcomer acclimate to Dillon. Meanwhile, Coach Taylor decides on a big career move that will change his life. A development in a police search deeply affects the lives of Tyra and Landry.

episodes.name: Let's Get It On
episodes.title: Let's Get It On
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor returns to Dillon, but it is not an easy homecoming; the team must deal with conflict between Saracen and Smash; Riggins turns to Lyla for help in changing Street's mind about surgery.

episodes.name: How Did I Get Here?
episodes.title: How Did I Get Here?
episodes.overview: Key evidence comes in implicating Landry; when Tami's sister visits to help her with the baby, she stirs things up in the house; Riggins must prove to coach Taylor that he wants to be a part of the team.

episodes.name: Pantherama!
episodes.title: Pantherama!
episodes.overview: As college football scouts approach Smash, he must make a life-changing decision. Coach Taylor has set his sights on a potential addition to the team. Tami appoints Lyla and Tyra to be in charge of this year's Pantherama. Matt is living his dream, with his new cheerleader girlfriend by his side, but yet he is drawn to the live-in nurse. Julie turns her jealousy into a twisted relationship.

episodes.name: Seeing Other People
episodes.title: Seeing Other People
episodes.overview: As Smash sets out on his first recruitment trip, Saracen asks his cheerleader girlfriend for an open relationship.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.title: The Confession
episodes.overview: Landry admits to the murder of Tyra’s assaulter but the struggle with his conscience continues. Meanwhile Jason Street is set up with an online dating service by Herc. The Taylors get ready for baby Gracie’s christening, while tensions increase between Tami and Julie.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Dillon County is hit by a tornado with Laribee High School affected by the damage forcing both rivals to share Dillon's resources. Julie and Tami adjust to Tim Riggins' living in their house, and tension builds between Landry and Tyra.

episodes.name: Jumping the Gun
episodes.title: Jumping the Gun
episodes.overview: Brian "Smash" Williams takes heat from the major colleges that want a verbal commitment to their program. Meanwhile tension is still high between Coach Taylor and Tim Riggins regarding the situation with Julie. Tim doesn't know where to turn. And all eyes are on Coach Taylor as he prepares the Panthers to play Laribee High School in the season's biggest game.

episodes.name: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.overview: Tami and Coach Taylor look into day care for Gracie, but find themselves having a tough time letting go. Meanwhile, Lyla starts working as a deejay on a Christian radio station and, despite being ridiculed by Tim Riggins, she is able to strike a chord with him. Elsewhere, Matt Saracen discovers that he is actually in love with his grandma's at-home nurse, while Brian "Smash" Williams learns that those close to him may not be ready for interracial dating.

episodes.name: Humble Pie
episodes.title: Humble Pie
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor hires Tami as the girls volleyball coach and enlists the help of Tyra. Smash has a confrontation at a movie theater and is faced with a dilemma.

episodes.name: Leave No One Behind
episodes.title: Leave No One Behind
episodes.overview: Matt Saracen reaches at his lowest point. Meanwhile, Tami Taylor’s relationship continues to blossom with Tyra. Julie  becomes envious. Landry has an admirer. Elsewhere, Smash seeks advice from Coach Taylor.

episodes.name: May the Best Man Win
episodes.title: May the Best Man Win
episodes.overview:
Smash's hunt for a college football scholarship turns into something completely different. Tami comes across her high school boyfriend, whose job as a real estate magnate has brought him to Dillon, making Coach Taylor jealous.

Jason is offered a life-changing opportunity. Riggins goes after Lyla this time using more unconventional methods.

episodes.name: I Knew You When
episodes.title: I Knew You When
episodes.overview: In the third-season opener, Eric fights to keep his job and helps Smash rebound. Elsewhere, Tami faces new challenges as principal; Tyra frets over college; Billy proposes; and tension escalates between Lyla and Riggins.

episodes.name: Tami Knows Best
episodes.title: Tami Knows Best
episodes.overview: Tami becomes angry by Tyra's actions. In an effort to help his grandma, Matt stumbles upon his estranged mother. Coach Taylor tries his best to encourage Smash as he tries to make the college tryouts.

episodes.name: How the Other Half Lives
episodes.title: How the Other Half Lives
episodes.overview: Coach worries and fears for his job as Tami befriends Katie McCoy. The pressure is on Matt as everyone's hopes turn to the new quarterback. Matt's friendly with Julie. Billy drags Tim into a risky scheme to get them out of debt. Lyla cautions Tim.

episodes.name: Hello, Goodbye
episodes.title: Hello, Goodbye
episodes.overview: Tami embarrasses herself with the superintendent. Tyra breaks with Landry to take up with Cash, the new bad boy in town. Julie advises Matt who is upset with his mother who has come to help with grandma. Smash has an emotional goodbye with Coach.

episodes.name: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.title: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.overview: Matt grapples with his mother, his emotions and Coach Taylor as McCoy garners more attention. Tami tangles with Tyra about Julie and Tyra's interest in Cash. Tyra experiences Cash's darker side. Erin disappoints Jason.

episodes.name: It Ain't Easy Being J.D. McCoy
episodes.title: It Ain't Easy Being J.D. McCoy
episodes.overview: Coach is furious with Tim and the team for a freshman hazing. J.D. wins the respect of the town and team. A late night swim at the lake turns into more for Julie and Matt. Tyra is shocked when a woman shows up claiming Cash owes her child support.

episodes.name: Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.title: Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.overview: Eric and Tami try to calm Jamarca's angry parents; Billy helps Tim pursue a scholarship; and Jason, Herc and the Riggins brothers receive good news.

episodes.name: New York, New York
episodes.title: New York, New York
episodes.overview: Tim is worried when Jason talks about leaving Dillon. Money troubles cause a riff between Tami and Eric. Tyra leans on Cash when things get tough, while Julie talks to her dad about Matt's idea.

episodes.name: Game of the Week
episodes.title: Game of the Week
episodes.overview: Tim returns to find both good and bad surprises. Coach has to change his plans and reluctantly supports Tami when she feels obligated to help Tyra out of a jam. Saracen has second thoughts and clashes with Shelby. Lyla and Mindy team up.

episodes.name: The Giving Tree
episodes.title: The Giving Tree
episodes.overview: It becomes clear JD has no interest in his father's advice regarding Madison. Lyla turns to Riggins when Buddy reveals a secret. Coach is emotionally challenged both on and off the field. Tyra has a plan to repair her relationship with Landry.

episodes.name: A Hard Rain's Gonna Fall
episodes.title: A Hard Rain's Gonna Fall
episodes.overview: Tyra is desperate and once again turns to Landry. Coach and Tami learn of a change that could dismantle the Panthers team. Tim sees another side of Lyla. Matt flips out when Grandma suffers an accident. Tensions escalate between JD and Joe.

episodes.name: Underdogs
episodes.title: Underdogs
episodes.overview: J.D.'s dad has to deal with child protective services after his fight with J.D. Tyra realizes that life isn't fair and that she needs to do whatever is necessary to get in to college. Matt and Tim prepare for the last game of their high school career: The Texas State Championship.

episodes.name: Tomorrow Blues
episodes.title: Tomorrow Blues
episodes.overview: Five months later, Coach Taylor's contract is up for review on Billy and Mindy's wedding day. Tyra grows anxious about her waitlist status. Matt leaves Grandma Saracen and Julie behind to attend college. Tim and Lyla question their future together.

episodes.name: East of Dillon
episodes.title: East of Dillon
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor wonders how low his fortunes can sink as he struggles to pull the East Dillon Lions together while Tami navigates the new politics at West Dillon. Meanwhile, Matt gets a taste of life as a townie and Tim is inspired by a college lecture on "the hero's journey."

episodes.name: After the Fall
episodes.title: After the Fall
episodes.overview: A controversy at West Dillon puts star player Luke Cafferty on the Lions' roster. Elsewhere, Coach tries to reenergize his demoralized team and Tami takes an unpopular stand. Meanwhile, Matt meets an uncouth local artist and Tim finds a new living situation in an unexpected place.

episodes.name: In the Skin of a Lion
episodes.title: In the Skin of a Lion
episodes.overview: Coach betrays Tami's trust over a financial decision. tensions between Vince and Luke threaten the team's chances on the field. Tim helps Coach condition his players. Julie doesn't want to go to church.

episodes.name: A Sort of Homecoming
episodes.title: A Sort of Homecoming
episodes.overview: Homecoming at the newly-reopened school prompts Coach to investigate East Dillon's history. Tami feels the wrath of the boosters. Landry and Vince both like Jess. Julie accompanies Devin to a gay bar. Matt and Tim go hunting.

episodes.name: The Son
episodes.title: The Son
episodes.overview: Julie, Landry, Coach, and Tami rally around Matt in a time of crisis; Vince endangers his rising star as a football player by engaging in criminal activity in order to support his family; Becky and Tim grow closer.

episodes.name: Stay
episodes.title: Stay
episodes.overview: Coach searches for a strategy to shut down their toughest opponent yet. Tim reconnects with Lyla. Vince discovers he has a gift for car theft. Julie and Matt attend a concert in Austin and reach a critical juncture in their relationship.

episodes.name: In the Bag
episodes.title: In the Bag
episodes.overview: Despite some doubt, Coach makes Vince quarterback. Tami struggles to comfort Julie who's grieving over Matt's sudden departure. Tim has a confrontation with Becky's dad. Luke is badly injured. Landry makes a play for Jess.

episodes.name: Toilet Bowl
episodes.title: Toilet Bowl
episodes.overview: Eric realizes that East Dillon's problems aren't only on the field; Jess tries to choose between Vince and Landry; Luke's injury takes a toll on him; and Riggins makes a decision that could backfire.

episodes.name: The Lights in Carroll Park
episodes.title: The Lights in Carroll Park
episodes.overview: Coach talks tough to shady characters when trying to clean up a park ridden with drugs and gang violence. Becky discovers she's pregnant. Jess's relationship with Landry is heating up. Julie makes a new friend.

episodes.name: I Can't
episodes.title: I Can't
episodes.overview: Riggins puts Tami in a tough spot; Julie asks a friend to dinner; Vince’s mom has a health crisis; Luke’s parents look for ways to help him; and Eric is urged to change his coaching style.

episodes.name: Injury List
episodes.title: Injury List
episodes.overview: The team can't focus on their next game. Tami gets involved in a controversy. Vince wants to end his deal with Kennard. Julie gets an unexpected phone call from Matt.

episodes.name: Laboring
episodes.title: Laboring
episodes.overview: Tensions in town run high as the Panthers/Lions game approaches; Coach tells Luke he won't be playing; Tami attempts to placate her detractors; developments both good and bad shake up the Riggins boys; Vince teams up with Kennard to seek revenge.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.title: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: The Taylors host Thanksgiving dinner; Coach tells Vince he has to be more selfish; Tami must make an apology; Julie and Landry are surprised by a visitor from their past; Tim makes a difficult decision; East Dillon rallies around the Lions.

episodes.name: Expectations
episodes.title: Expectations
episodes.overview: Coach tempers high expectations for East Dillon's impending season; Vince and Luke work to recruit a new player for the Lions' squad; Dillon bids farewell to two alumni as they prepare to leave for college.

episodes.name: On the Outside Looking In
episodes.title: On the Outside Looking In
episodes.overview: Eric realizes that the Lions' performance in the first game of the season hasn't satisfied everyone; Vince receives unexpected benefits from his status as a football player; and Luke's aggression on the field has repercussions.

episodes.name: The Right Hand of the Father
episodes.title: The Right Hand of the Father
episodes.overview: Someone from Vince's past resurfaces. Julie connects with a faculty member. Eric tries to instill discipline in the team. Buddy is troubled after learning something about his son.

episodes.name: Keep Looking
episodes.title: Keep Looking
episodes.overview: Coach is forced to play mediator as tensions erupt in the locker room. Luke gets recruited. Buddy deals with the trials and tribulations of fatherhood. Tami deals with a troubled student. The Lions welcome a new player.

episodes.name: Kingdom
episodes.title: Kingdom
episodes.overview: Coach discusses recruitment regulations. The Lions take a road trip. East Dillon's four stars make a pact. Julie's relationship becomes more complicated.

episodes.name: Swerve
episodes.title: Swerve
episodes.overview: A popular magazine hails Coach as the "Kingmaker." Vince's past catches up to him. Luke reacts to the truth. A suspicious accident delays Julie's return to college.

episodes.name: Perfect Record
episodes.title: Perfect Record
episodes.overview: Rivalry week stirs up controversy. Vince is caught in the middle between Coach and Ornette. Billy takes Luke under his wing.

episodes.name: Fracture
episodes.title: Fracture
episodes.overview: Coach fears he's beginning to lose his grip on the team. Tami worries that one of her students is being neglected. Vince alienates his teammates. Becky enters a beauty pageant.

episodes.name: Gut Check
episodes.title: Gut Check
episodes.overview: Coach threatens to suspend Vince. Luke faces pressure. Billy learns some surprising news from Mindy. Becky starts a surprising new job.

episodes.name: Don't Go
episodes.title: Don't Go
episodes.overview: An elite college football program attempts to lure Coach away from East Dillon. Vince vows to earn his spot back. Friends and family speak at Tim's parole hearing. East Dillon holds a Fall Sports Banquet.

episodes.name: The March
episodes.title: The March
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor feels threatened as East Dillon faces serious budget cuts; Tami is flown to Pennsylvania for the opportunity of a lifetime; The Lions begin their quest for state; Vince becomes the man of the house again.

episodes.name: Texas Whatever
episodes.title: Texas Whatever
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor is offered a deal he can’t refuse; Tim assesses his future plans when an old flame returns to Dillon; The fate of East Dillon’s football program is decided.

episodes.name: Always
episodes.title: Always
episodes.overview: While the Lions prepare for the state championship game, the Taylors face several decisions that could change their lives forever.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: A newcomer coach Eric Taylor finds himself helming a promising high school football team, the Dillon Panthers, that has a real chance to make it to the top.

episodes.name: Eyes Wide Open
episodes.title: Eyes Wide Open
episodes.overview: As the team pulls together and tries to help Matt get used to his new role as quarterback after Jason's injury, Lyla offers her support to Tim.Jason learns about the extent of his injury, and Tami gets a job as the school guidance counselor.

episodes.name: Wind Sprints
episodes.title: Wind Sprints
episodes.overview: The situation in town begins to get ugly as Coach Taylor and his family is forced to endure heat from a difficult loss against the San Marco HS Rattlers.Tim and Tyra break up after he confronts her about Smash, and Lyla, after having an argument with Jason, vents her anger onto Tim.

episodes.name: Who's Your Daddy
episodes.title: Who's Your Daddy
episodes.overview: As the Panthers prepare for a match against the Tigers, who are their biggest rival, Jason's new roommate tries to help him understand the potential he has for recovery.Lyla tells Tim of her regrets about what happened between them, and Matt hits an all-time low.

episodes.name: Git 'Er Done
episodes.title: Git 'Er Done
episodes.overview: The big game against the Tigers drawing closer, Coach Taylor must decide between Matt and the self-assured recruit Ray "Voodoo" Tatum for the starting quarterback. The feelings between Tim and Lyla grow stronger. Jason's newly-found motivation strives him to begin the rehab.

episodes.name: El Accidente
episodes.title: El Accidente
episodes.overview:
Ray Tatum faces the blame of his team mates after Panthers' win in the game last week might be overturned.

Defensive tackle Bobby Reyes is arrested by the police during a practice for beating a student. Coach Taylor and Buddy Garrity are questioned by the Texas High School athletic administration.Lyla and Tim surprise Jason by taking him to the lake.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.title: Homecoming
episodes.overview: As the Panthers get ready to face the dominating Laribee Lions, the 2000 State Champ quarterback, Lucas Mize is set to join the team.Smash catches his chance to convince a college scout of his talents. A focused Tim quits drinking. Jason's suspicions of Lyla and Tim's affair grow. Tyra and Billy set up an after game homecoming party.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.title: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: Julie thinks about going on a date with Matt. A discouraged Smash turns to foul play to improve his on-pitch performance. Cheered by Lyla and Tim, Jason has his first quad rugby game. A dinner turns into a fight for Coach Taylor, Tami, Riggins and his brother.

episodes.name: Full Hearts
episodes.title: Full Hearts
episodes.overview: Smash continues to go the extreme to improve his performance. Rumors begin to spread about Tim and Lyla's relationship. Julie and Matt attempt to go out on a date but it is cursed from the beginning.The Panthers are in much anticipation for their upcoming game against the Gatling High.

episodes.name: It's Different for Girls
episodes.title: It's Different for Girls
episodes.overview: The cheerleaders prepare for Championship Classic. Lyla is picked on when people find out about her and Riggins. Coach Taylor tries to keep Matt and Julie apart. Jason goes home after being released from rehab.

episodes.name: Nevermind
episodes.title: Nevermind
episodes.overview: The Panthers are preparing for another game they can't lose. Matt's father comes back from Iraq but his mother's condition is difficult to take in.Tami Taylor sees Tim Riggins regarding his grades. She believes he's not doing his homework by himself and asks Landry to tutor him for his next oral exam. If he doesn't pass, he won't play in the football team.

episodes.name: What to Do While You're Waiting
episodes.title: What to Do While You're Waiting
episodes.overview: The Panther's fate is hung up on the result of a game between two other teams and there is nothing they can do about it.Meanwhile, there is tension at the Street's house because of the lawsuit they introduced against Coach Taylor.Matt's father has a hard time adjusting back to real life.

episodes.name: Little Girl I Wanna Marry You
episodes.title: Little Girl I Wanna Marry You
episodes.overview: The Panthers have only one more game to win in order to qualify for the play-offs. Smash's mother discovers something that could end his football dreams.

episodes.name: Upping the Ante
episodes.title: Upping the Ante
episodes.overview: The Panthers prepare for their first playoff game.Coach Taylor gets distracted as he has to come up with a solution to Smash's use of drugs. Tyra and Julie befriend while Riggins bonds with his alienated father.Buddy learns about Jason and Lyla's engagement.

episodes.name: Blinders
episodes.title: Blinders
episodes.overview: The Panthers savor their crucial playoff-win-until race issues emerge and sorely test their bond after Mac makes racial statements.Tami frowns upon Julie's newfound friendship with Tyra. The girls play a powder-puff football game.

episodes.name: Black Eyes & Broken Hearts
episodes.title: Black Eyes & Broken Hearts
episodes.overview: Due to racial comments from Coach Mac, the black players on the team refuse to play unless he is sacked.Julie is sucked deeper into the vortex as her friendship with Tyra develops. Matt tries to win Julie back.

episodes.name: I Think We Should Have Sex
episodes.title: I Think We Should Have Sex
episodes.overview: After Julie reveals to Matt that she wants to have sex with him, Matt feels the need to put together something special. Tim clashes with his father.The Panthers are into the next round of the playoffs and looking solid.

episodes.name: Extended Families
episodes.title: Extended Families
episodes.overview: Lyla makes a surprise visit to the quad rugby camp where Jason is playing at, but she doesn't find the comfort she came looking for.Buddy Garrity's affair with Tyra's mother comes out. Consequently, Buddy decides to move in with the Taylors.Smash becomes suspicious about Waverly when she goes for a midnight swim with him.

episodes.name: Ch-Ch-Ch-Ch-Changes
episodes.title: Ch-Ch-Ch-Ch-Changes
episodes.overview: With TMU trying to recruit Coach Taylor, Julie insists that she will not be moved away from Matt and Dillon. The quad rugby recruiters in Austin deliver some bad news to Jason. Riggins becomes friends with a single mother and her son.

episodes.name: Mud Bowl
episodes.title: Mud Bowl
episodes.overview: An chemical spill near Dillon High School forces Coach Taylor and the Panthers to seek another facility in which to play the crucial State Semi-Final game.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview:
Coach Taylor buckles under the pressure from Texas Methodist University. The news of his decision is not taken lightly by his family.

Riggins faces the impending consequences of his relationship. Landry wonders whether he should tell someone about Tyra's situation.

episodes.name: State
episodes.title: State
episodes.overview:
The rumors about Coach Taylor leaving the team at the end of the season get a boost when an inside source decides to speak up.

Meanwhile, the Panthers are preparing themselves for the state championship.

episodes.name: Last Days of Summer
episodes.title: Last Days of Summer
episodes.overview: Changes in the team force Dillon Panthers to work harder than ever before to achieve the same level of success they had last season. Losing Coach Taylor to TMU might prove to be their biggest setback. Tyra gets a shock visitor. Matt and Landry struggle with their everyday life, as it is not what they expected.

episodes.name: Bad Ideas
episodes.title: Bad Ideas
episodes.overview: So many things have changed at Dillon High and the first day of school is the real test. Matt stands by as his world comes crashing down, while Landry still copes to make sense of his. All eyes seem to be focusing on Smash, while Tami tries to adjust to having a teenager and a newborn.

episodes.name: Are You Ready for Friday Night?
episodes.title: Are You Ready for Friday Night?
episodes.overview: Matt and Smash have a hard time listening to their coach as they prepare for their first game of the new season. Coach Taylor heads back to Dillon to check on his family and finds out just what is happening to the Panthers since he's left.

episodes.name: Backfire
episodes.title: Backfire
episodes.overview: Tim and Jason go to Mexico as Street hopes to explore experimental surgery. Riggins, who is worried about Street, turns to Lyla Garrity, who's busy helping a newcomer acclimate to Dillon. Meanwhile, Coach Taylor decides on a big career move that will change his life. A development in a police search deeply affects the lives of Tyra and Landry.

episodes.name: Let's Get It On
episodes.title: Let's Get It On
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor returns to Dillon, but it is not an easy homecoming; the team must deal with conflict between Saracen and Smash; Riggins turns to Lyla for help in changing Street's mind about surgery.

episodes.name: How Did I Get Here?
episodes.title: How Did I Get Here?
episodes.overview: Key evidence comes in implicating Landry; when Tami's sister visits to help her with the baby, she stirs things up in the house; Riggins must prove to coach Taylor that he wants to be a part of the team.

episodes.name: Pantherama!
episodes.title: Pantherama!
episodes.overview: As college football scouts approach Smash, he must make a life-changing decision. Coach Taylor has set his sights on a potential addition to the team. Tami appoints Lyla and Tyra to be in charge of this year's Pantherama. Matt is living his dream, with his new cheerleader girlfriend by his side, but yet he is drawn to the live-in nurse. Julie turns her jealousy into a twisted relationship.

episodes.name: Seeing Other People
episodes.title: Seeing Other People
episodes.overview: As Smash sets out on his first recruitment trip, Saracen asks his cheerleader girlfriend for an open relationship.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.title: The Confession
episodes.overview: Landry admits to the murder of Tyra’s assaulter but the struggle with his conscience continues. Meanwhile Jason Street is set up with an online dating service by Herc. The Taylors get ready for baby Gracie’s christening, while tensions increase between Tami and Julie.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Dillon County is hit by a tornado with Laribee High School affected by the damage forcing both rivals to share Dillon's resources. Julie and Tami adjust to Tim Riggins' living in their house, and tension builds between Landry and Tyra.

episodes.name: Jumping the Gun
episodes.title: Jumping the Gun
episodes.overview: Brian "Smash" Williams takes heat from the major colleges that want a verbal commitment to their program. Meanwhile tension is still high between Coach Taylor and Tim Riggins regarding the situation with Julie. Tim doesn't know where to turn. And all eyes are on Coach Taylor as he prepares the Panthers to play Laribee High School in the season's biggest game.

episodes.name: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.overview: Tami and Coach Taylor look into day care for Gracie, but find themselves having a tough time letting go. Meanwhile, Lyla starts working as a deejay on a Christian radio station and, despite being ridiculed by Tim Riggins, she is able to strike a chord with him. Elsewhere, Matt Saracen discovers that he is actually in love with his grandma's at-home nurse, while Brian "Smash" Williams learns that those close to him may not be ready for interracial dating.

episodes.name: Humble Pie
episodes.title: Humble Pie
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor hires Tami as the girls volleyball coach and enlists the help of Tyra. Smash has a confrontation at a movie theater and is faced with a dilemma.

episodes.name: Leave No One Behind
episodes.title: Leave No One Behind
episodes.overview: Matt Saracen reaches at his lowest point. Meanwhile, Tami Taylor’s relationship continues to blossom with Tyra. Julie  becomes envious. Landry has an admirer. Elsewhere, Smash seeks advice from Coach Taylor.

episodes.name: May the Best Man Win
episodes.title: May the Best Man Win
episodes.overview:
Smash's hunt for a college football scholarship turns into something completely different. Tami comes across her high school boyfriend, whose job as a real estate magnate has brought him to Dillon, making Coach Taylor jealous.

Jason is offered a life-changing opportunity. Riggins goes after Lyla this time using more unconventional methods.

episodes.name: I Knew You When
episodes.title: I Knew You When
episodes.overview: In the third-season opener, Eric fights to keep his job and helps Smash rebound. Elsewhere, Tami faces new challenges as principal; Tyra frets over college; Billy proposes; and tension escalates between Lyla and Riggins.

episodes.name: Tami Knows Best
episodes.title: Tami Knows Best
episodes.overview: Tami becomes angry by Tyra's actions. In an effort to help his grandma, Matt stumbles upon his estranged mother. Coach Taylor tries his best to encourage Smash as he tries to make the college tryouts.

episodes.name: How the Other Half Lives
episodes.title: How the Other Half Lives
episodes.overview: Coach worries and fears for his job as Tami befriends Katie McCoy. The pressure is on Matt as everyone's hopes turn to the new quarterback. Matt's friendly with Julie. Billy drags Tim into a risky scheme to get them out of debt. Lyla cautions Tim.

episodes.name: Hello, Goodbye
episodes.title: Hello, Goodbye
episodes.overview: Tami embarrasses herself with the superintendent. Tyra breaks with Landry to take up with Cash, the new bad boy in town. Julie advises Matt who is upset with his mother who has come to help with grandma. Smash has an emotional goodbye with Coach.

episodes.name: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.title: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.overview: Matt grapples with his mother, his emotions and Coach Taylor as McCoy garners more attention. Tami tangles with Tyra about Julie and Tyra's interest in Cash. Tyra experiences Cash's darker side. Erin disappoints Jason.

episodes.name: It Ain't Easy Being J.D. McCoy
episodes.title: It Ain't Easy Being J.D. McCoy
episodes.overview: Coach is furious with Tim and the team for a freshman hazing. J.D. wins the respect of the town and team. A late night swim at the lake turns into more for Julie and Matt. Tyra is shocked when a woman shows up claiming Cash owes her child support.

episodes.name: Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.title: Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.overview: Eric and Tami try to calm Jamarca's angry parents; Billy helps Tim pursue a scholarship; and Jason, Herc and the Riggins brothers receive good news.

episodes.name: New York, New York
episodes.title: New York, New York
episodes.overview: Tim is worried when Jason talks about leaving Dillon. Money troubles cause a riff between Tami and Eric. Tyra leans on Cash when things get tough, while Julie talks to her dad about Matt's idea.

episodes.name: Game of the Week
episodes.title: Game of the Week
episodes.overview: Tim returns to find both good and bad surprises. Coach has to change his plans and reluctantly supports Tami when she feels obligated to help Tyra out of a jam. Saracen has second thoughts and clashes with Shelby. Lyla and Mindy team up.

episodes.name: The Giving Tree
episodes.title: The Giving Tree
episodes.overview: It becomes clear JD has no interest in his father's advice regarding Madison. Lyla turns to Riggins when Buddy reveals a secret. Coach is emotionally challenged both on and off the field. Tyra has a plan to repair her relationship with Landry.

episodes.name: A Hard Rain's Gonna Fall
episodes.title: A Hard Rain's Gonna Fall
episodes.overview: Tyra is desperate and once again turns to Landry. Coach and Tami learn of a change that could dismantle the Panthers team. Tim sees another side of Lyla. Matt flips out when Grandma suffers an accident. Tensions escalate between JD and Joe.

episodes.name: Underdogs
episodes.title: Underdogs
episodes.overview: J.D.'s dad has to deal with child protective services after his fight with J.D. Tyra realizes that life isn't fair and that she needs to do whatever is necessary to get in to college. Matt and Tim prepare for the last game of their high school career: The Texas State Championship.

episodes.name: Tomorrow Blues
episodes.title: Tomorrow Blues
episodes.overview: Five months later, Coach Taylor's contract is up for review on Billy and Mindy's wedding day. Tyra grows anxious about her waitlist status. Matt leaves Grandma Saracen and Julie behind to attend college. Tim and Lyla question their future together.

episodes.name: East of Dillon
episodes.title: East of Dillon
episodes.overview: Coach Taylor wonders how low his fortunes can sink as he struggles to pull the East Dillon Lions together while Tami navigates the new politics at West Dillon. Meanwhile, Matt gets a taste of life as a townie and Tim is inspired by a college lecture on "the hero's journey."

episodes.name: After the Fall
episodes.title: After the Fall
episodes.overview: A controversy at West Dillon puts star player Luke Cafferty on the Lions' roster. Elsewhere, Coach tries to reenergize his demoralized team and Tami takes an unpopular stand. Meanwhile, Matt meets an uncouth local artist and Tim finds a new living situation in an unexpected place.

episodes.name: In the Skin of a Lion
episodes.title: In the Skin of a Lion
episodes.overview: Coach betrays Tami's trust over a financial decision. tensions between Vince and Luke threaten the team's chances on the field. Tim helps Coach condition his players. Julie doesn't want to go to church.

episodes.name: A Sort of Homecoming
episodes.title: A Sort of Homecoming
episodes.overview: Homecoming at the newly-reopened school prompts Coach to investigate East Dillon's history. Tami feels the wrath of the boosters. Landry and Vince both like Jess. Julie accompanies Devin to a gay bar. Matt and Tim go hunting.

episodes.name: The Son
episodes.title: The Son
episodes.overview: Julie, Landry, Coach, and Tami rally around Matt in a time of crisis; Vince endangers his rising star as a football player by engaging in criminal activity in order to support his family; Becky and Tim grow closer.

episodes.name: Stay
episodes.title: Stay
episodes.overview: Coach searches for a strategy to shut down their toughest opponent yet. Tim reconnects with Lyla. Vince discovers he has a gift for car theft. Julie and Matt attend a concert in Austin and reach a critical juncture in their relationship.

episodes.name: In the Bag
episodes.title: In the Bag
episodes.overview: Despite some doubt, Coach makes Vince quarterback. Tami struggles to comfort Julie who's grieving over Matt's sudden departure. Tim has a confrontation with Becky's dad. Luke is badly injured. Landry makes a play for Jess.

episodes.name: Toilet Bowl
episodes.title: Toilet Bowl
episodes.overview: Eric realizes that East Dillon's problems aren't only on the field; Jess tries to choose between Vince and Landry; Luke's injury takes a toll on him; and Riggins makes a decision that could backfire.

episodes.name: The Lights in Carroll Park
episodes.title: The Lights in Carroll Park
episodes.overview: Coach talks tough to shady characters when trying to clean up a park ridden with drugs and gang violence. Becky discovers she's pregnant. Jess's relationship with Landry is heating up. Julie makes a new friend.

episodes.name: I Can't
episodes.title: I Can't
episodes.overview: Riggins puts Tami in a tough spot; Julie asks a friend to dinner; Vince’s mom has a health crisis; Luke’s parents look for ways to help him; and Eric is urged to change his coaching style.

episodes.name: Injury List
episodes.title: Injury List
episodes.overview: The team can't focus on their next game. Tami gets involved in a controversy. Vince wants to end his deal with Kennard. Julie gets an unexpected phone call from Matt.

episodes.name: Laboring
episodes.title: Laboring
episodes.overview: Tensions in town run high as the Panthers/Lions game approaches; Coach tells Luke he won't be playing; Tami attempts to placate her detractors; developments both good and bad shake up the Riggins boys; Vince teams up with Kennard to seek revenge.

episodes.title: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: The Taylors host Thanksgiving dinner; Coach tells Vince he has to be more selfish; Tami must make an apology; Julie and Landry are surprised by a visitor from their past; Tim makes a difficult decision; East Dillon rallies around the Lions.

episodes.overview: Coach tempers high expectations for East Dillon's impending season; Vince and Luke work to recruit a new player for the Lions' squad; Dillon bids farewell to two alumni as they prepare to leave for college.

episodes.overview: Coach fears he's beginning to lose his grip on the team. Tami worries that one of her students is being neglected. Vince alienates his teammates. Becky enters a beauty pageant.

episodes.title: Gut Check
episodes.overview: Coach threatens to suspend Vince. Luke faces pressure. Billy learns some surprising news from Mindy. Becky starts a surprising new job.

episodes.overview: An elite college football program attempts to lure Coach away from East Dillon. Vince vows to earn his spot back. Friends and family speak at Tim's parole hearing. East Dillon holds a Fall Sports Banquet.

episodes.overview: Coach Taylor feels threatened as East Dillon faces serious budget cuts; Tami is flown to Pennsylvania for the opportunity of a lifetime; The Lions begin their quest for state; Vince becomes the man of the house again.
