episodes.name: Return Home from Europe
episodes.title: Return Home from Europe
episodes.overview: The Ricardos and Mertzes need to return to the U.S. by plane instead of ship. The 60-pound-per-person baggage limit taxes Lucy's ingenuity: she has bought lots of clothes and souvenirs, including a 30-pound cheese. She boards the plane wearing all the clothes at once and carrying the cheese as a "baby."

episodes.name: Lucy and Bob Hope
episodes.title: Lucy and Bob Hope
episodes.overview: Ricky is opening a new club, and he wants Bob Hope to appear at the grand opening. Lucy fears Hope won't appear because of her widespread reputation for monkey-wrench throwing, and wants to reassure him that this time she's butting out.

episodes.name: Little Ricky Learns to Play the Drums
episodes.title: Little Ricky Learns to Play the Drums
episodes.overview: Little Ricky gets drums and the Mertzes get headaches. So do Lucy and Ricky, but they're not about to evict themselves.

episodes.name: Lucy Meets Orson Welles
episodes.title: Lucy Meets Orson Welles
episodes.overview: Lucy tries to get in a skit with Orson Welles at Ricky's club, thinking it is a Shakespearean play that he will be doing. When Orson Welles tells Lucy she can be in the show, she calls her old high school drama teacher to tell her the news. Lucy's old teacher sends her whole drama class to Club Babalu to see Lucy perform. But poor Lucy! It turns out Welles only wanted her to be his assistant for a magic trick.

episodes.name: Little Ricky Gets Stage Fright
episodes.title: Little Ricky Gets Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Little Ricky is scheduled to play the drums in a children's orchestra. Although his parents and their friends the Mertzes are overcome with nervousness, Little Ricky seems calm until his big moment arrives; then he goes to pieces. His next performance is six months away, but Lucy feels she must do something about his stage fright now.

episodes.name: Visitor from Italy
episodes.title: Visitor from Italy
episodes.overview: Mario, the Ricardos and Mertzes' gondolier in Venice, comes to New York to surprise his brother Dominic, but turns up at the Ricardos' apartment when he can't find him. Lucy is sure Dominic is in San Francisco and sets out to help Mario raise the bus fare. Her earnest efforts pay off in a surprising way.

episodes.name: Off to Florida
episodes.title: Off to Florida
episodes.overview: When Lucy misplaces two train tickets to Florida, she and Ethel consult the classified section, hoping to share a ride with someone driving south. They team up with a peculiar middle-aged woman, Mrs. Grundy, who's bent on getting to Florida in record time.

episodes.name: Deep Sea Fishing
episodes.title: Deep Sea Fishing
episodes.overview: It's Lucy and Ethel vs. Ricky and Fred in a fishing contest while they're on a Florida vacation. The wager: $150 (about what Lucy and Ethel had spent in hotel boutiques), so both sides do a little cheating to ensure a victory.

episodes.name: Desert Island
episodes.title: Desert Island
episodes.overview: Lucy and Ethel will do anything to keep Ricky and Fred from judging a Miami Beach beauty contest (and end up being menaced on a seemingly deserted island as a result).

episodes.name: The Ricardos Visit Cuba
episodes.title: The Ricardos Visit Cuba
episodes.overview: Still on their vacation, the Ricardos go to Cuba, where Ricky wants to introduce his relatives to Lucy and Little Ricky.

episodes.name: Little Ricky's School Pageant
episodes.title: Little Ricky's School Pageant
episodes.overview: Little Ricky's school pageant "The Enchanted Forest" is coming up and it's coming up short on cast members, so the Ricardos and Mertzes volunteer. Ricky's a hollow stump, Fred's a frog and Ethel's the fairy princess. And Lucy? She's a witch.

episodes.name: Christmas Show
episodes.title: Christmas Show
episodes.overview: The Ricardos and Mertzes spend Christmas Eve decorating a tree - and remembering moments that led up to the birth of Little Ricky five years earlier.

episodes.name: Lucy and the Loving Cup
episodes.title: Lucy and the Loving Cup
episodes.overview: Ricky's disapproval of Lucy's new hat leads to her trying on a loving cup which Ricky has planned to present to jockey Johnny Longden at a National Turf Association dinner. The problem is that Lucy can't get the trophy off her head.

episodes.name: Lucy and Superman
episodes.title: Lucy and Superman
episodes.overview: When Stevie Appleby, Caroline's son, has a birthday party the same day as Little Ricky's, Lucy looks for unusual entertainment to lure the children. Ricky remembers that Superman is in town, and he invites him. But when Ricky is unable to corral Superman, Lucy is left with no choice but to dress as the Man of Steel herself. George Reeves makes a special guest-star appearance in this episode.

episodes.name: Little Ricky Gets a Dog
episodes.title: Little Ricky Gets a Dog
episodes.overview: The Ricardos' apartment begins to resemble a pet shop when Little Ricky gets a puppy. Lucy and Ricky are both determined to get rid of the puppy after their son brings it home -- as are their landlords, Fred and Ethel. They have a hard time overcoming Little Ricky's arguments that a puppy would be a welcome addition to a home that already boasts a canary, a frog, a lizard, a turtle, and some goldfish.

episodes.name: Lucy Wants to Move to the Country
episodes.title: Lucy Wants to Move to the Country
episodes.overview: Lucy decides that it would be nice to move to the country and prevails on Ricky to place a comfortable deposit on a big house. Ricky agrees and puts a down payment on a house in Westport, Connecticut. It is not long before Lucy changes her mind. Lucy, Ethel, and Fred put on disguises to try and help poor Ricky get his deposit back.

episodes.name: Lucy Hates to Leave
episodes.title: Lucy Hates to Leave
episodes.overview: The Ricardos find themselves, and all their belongings, boarding with the Mertzes while they wait to move into their new Westport, Connecticut home.

episodes.name: Lucy Misses the Mertzes
episodes.title: Lucy Misses the Mertzes
episodes.overview: As the Ricardos get settled in their new country home, they immediately wind up in a mix-up with their old friends Fred and Ethel Mertz. Missing their old friends already, Lucy and Ricky decide to visit the Mertzes. At the same time, the Mertzes decide to trek to the country to visit the Ricardos, and what began simply becomes complicated.

episodes.name: Lucy Gets Chummy With the Neighbors
episodes.title: Lucy Gets Chummy With the Neighbors
episodes.overview: With the best intentions in the world, Lucy somehow causes a misunderstanding with her neighbors, the Ramseys. It all starts when Betty Ramsey offers Lucy some advice and a wholesale deal on furniture. For a time, the Ricardos' whole future at their Connecticut home seems threatened.

episodes.name: Lucy Raises Chickens
episodes.title: Lucy Raises Chickens
episodes.overview: The Mertzes find a way to stay with the Ricardos: chicken farming. But the scheme puts Lucy over her head in chickens when she and Ethel bring home 500 baby chicks before the hen house is ready.

episodes.name: Lucy Does the Tango
episodes.title: Lucy Does the Tango
episodes.overview: Chicken-raising and practicing a tango for Little Ricky's school PTA meeting combine to get the Ricardos and the Mertzes in a verbal battle. It's up to Ricky, Jr. and his neighborhood pal Bruce Ramsey to straighten things out.

episodes.name: Ragtime Band
episodes.title: Ragtime Band
episodes.overview: When Ricky refuses to bring his rumba band out to Westport to play for a Historical Society benefit, Lucy and the Mertzes put together a combo of their own, with Little Ricky on drums.

episodes.name: Lucy's Night in Town
episodes.title: Lucy's Night in Town
episodes.overview: After spending six whole weeks in their new Connecticut home, Lucy dreams of a night in New York City and it turns into a nightmare. Four carefully hoarded tickets to the Broadway musical hit "The Most Happy Fella" are supposed to get the Ricardos and the Mertzes in to see the sold-out show. But difficulties arise when Fred Mertz gets nervous about pickpockets because he's carrying $500 in cash in his pockets.

episodes.name: Housewarming
episodes.title: Housewarming
episodes.overview: Ethel is jealous of Lucy's friendship with Betty Ramsey. But when Betty reveals that she's from Ethel's home town of Albuquerque, the two become fast friends, and now it's Lucy who feels left out.

episodes.name: Building a B.B.Q.
episodes.title: Building a B.B.Q.
episodes.overview: Lucy has a problem deciding what to do to get her vacationing husband, Ricky, out of her hair so she can do her housework. She and Ethel solve the problem by putting their husbands to work building a barbecue.

episodes.name: Country Club Dance
episodes.title: Country Club Dance
episodes.overview: Lucy, Ethel, and Betty want their husbands to dance with their friends' visiting houseguest - until they see that she's a sultry, young blonde. Now the boys are only too happy to oblige - and the miffed wives decide to fight glamour with glamour.

episodes.name: Lucy Raises Tulips
episodes.title: Lucy Raises Tulips
episodes.overview: Suburban living gets Lucy into a flower-show competition, and she raises tulips with a vengeance as she tries to beat out her neighbor, Betty Ramsey, for first prize. Lucy asks Ricky to mow the lawn so that her garden will look just right. But he only mows half before taking off for a baseball game, leaving Lucy and Ethel to tiptoe through the tulips -- with the lawnmower.

episodes.name: The Ricardos Dedicate a Statue
episodes.title: The Ricardos Dedicate a Statue
episodes.overview: Ricky has been chosen to dedicate a new Revolutionary War statue in the Westport Town Square. There's a problem: Lucy has accidentally destroyed the one-of-a-kind sculpture.

items.title: The Twilight Zone
items.overview: An anthology series containing drama, psychological thriller, fantasy, science fiction, suspense, and/or horror, often concluding with a macabre or unexpected twist.

media.title: The Twilight Zone
media.overview: An anthology series containing drama, psychological thriller, fantasy, science fiction, suspense, and/or horror, often concluding with a macabre or unexpected twist.

episodes.name: Where Is Everybody?
episodes.title: Where Is Everybody?
episodes.overview: Mike Ferris finds himself in a town strangely devoid of people. But despite the emptiness, he has the odd feeling that he's being watched...

episodes.name: One for the Angels
episodes.title: One for the Angels
episodes.overview: A street salesman cleverly eludes Death. But if he lives, a little girl must die in his place.

episodes.name: Mr. Denton on Doomsday
episodes.title: Mr. Denton on Doomsday
episodes.overview: A has-been, drunk gunslinger finds his fast-draw abilities magically restored.

episodes.name: The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine
episodes.title: The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine
episodes.overview: An aging, former movie star lives and dreams in the past, constantly watching her old movies alone in her room.

episodes.name: Walking Distance
episodes.title: Walking Distance
episodes.overview: A stressed advertising executive, driving through the country, leaves his car and starts to walk toward his hometown, Homewood. He finds things exactly as they were when he was a child.

episodes.name: Escape Clause
episodes.title: Escape Clause
episodes.overview: A hypochondriac exchanges his soul for immortality and indestructibility.

episodes.name: The Lonely
episodes.title: The Lonely
episodes.overview: In 2046, imprisoned for murder on a distant asteroid, Corry receives an unexpected present that brings a semblance of companionship during his isolation.

episodes.name: Time Enough at Last
episodes.title: Time Enough at Last
episodes.overview: A bank teller, obsessed with reading, faces conflicts at work and home because of his passion for literature.

episodes.name: Perchance to Dream
episodes.title: Perchance to Dream
episodes.overview: A man with a heart condition explains to his psychiatrist that he feels extremely tired, because he is terrified of falling asleep for fear he might die.

episodes.name: Judgment Night
episodes.title: Judgment Night
episodes.overview: In 1942, a German wonders why he's on the deck of a British steamship, with no memory of how he got there.

episodes.name: And When the Sky Was Opened
episodes.title: And When the Sky Was Opened
episodes.overview: Recovering in the hospital after a space mission, Major William Gart is visited by his co-pilot Lieutenant Colonel Clegg Forbes, who insists on the existence of a third astronaut.

episodes.name: What You Need
episodes.title: What You Need
episodes.overview: A two-bit thug thinks he's found the key to a better life in an old sidewalk salesman who has the uncanny ability to tell people what they need the most.

episodes.name: The Four of Us are Dying
episodes.title: The Four of Us are Dying
episodes.overview: In this noirish tale, a man with the ability to change his face to resemble others gets into hot water with gangsters.

episodes.name: Third from the Sun
episodes.title: Third from the Sun
episodes.overview: With all-out nuclear war about to ignite, a scientist and his pilot friend plot to escape on an experimental spaceship.

episodes.name: I Shot an Arrow into the Air
episodes.title: I Shot an Arrow into the Air
episodes.overview: Three astronauts crash-land on an unknown planet and must confront survival challenges, unraveling their unity in the face of desperation.

episodes.name: The Hitch-Hiker
episodes.title: The Hitch-Hiker
episodes.overview: Alone on a cross-country trip, a woman continually encounters the same mysterious hitch-hiker who inexplicably reappears at various points in her journey.

episodes.name: The Fever
episodes.title: The Fever
episodes.overview: Tight fisted Franklin Gibbs is not pleased when his wife wins a trip for two to Las Vegas.  But things change when he falls under the spell of a slot machine that calls his name.

episodes.name: The Last Flight
episodes.title: The Last Flight
episodes.overview: A World War I flying ace flies through a mysterious cloud - and lands at a modern U.S. air base in the year 1959!

episodes.name: The Purple Testament
episodes.title: The Purple Testament
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Fitzgerald, serving in World War II, possesses the disquieting ability to foresee impending death by observing a strange glow on the faces of his men before battle.

episodes.name: Elegy
episodes.title: Elegy
episodes.overview: Three astronauts land on what looks like Earth 200 years before they left--only all of the people seem frozen in time.

episodes.name: Mirror Image
episodes.title: Mirror Image
episodes.overview: In a bus depot, Millicent Barnes experiences odd events, leading to concerns about her sanity.

episodes.name: The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
episodes.title: The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
episodes.overview: Paranoia strikes the residents of Maple Street when they believe human-looking aliens have invaded the neighborhood.

episodes.name: A World of Difference
episodes.title: A World of Difference
episodes.overview: Arthur Curtis, a successful businessman sitting in his office discovers that he is on a film set and everyone refers to him as Gerry Reagan, a movie star struggling with alcoholism and a declining career.

episodes.name: Long Live Walter Jameson
episodes.title: Long Live Walter Jameson
episodes.overview: Walter Jameson, a popular history professor, is suspected by his fiancée's father, another professor at the college, to be an immortal.

episodes.name: People are Alike All Over
episodes.title: People are Alike All Over
episodes.overview: After a space exploration crash-lands on Mars, the lone surviving astronaut is surprised to find that Martians are human-looking and friendly.

episodes.name: Execution
episodes.title: Execution
episodes.overview: Just before being hanged for shooting a man in the back, an outlaw cowboy in 1880 is transported into the future.

episodes.name: The Big Tall Wish
episodes.title: The Big Tall Wish
episodes.overview: Washed-up boxer Bolie Jackson, with the help of a special wish from his young friend Henry, miraculously switches places with his opponent during a comeback fight, turning the tide in his favor.

episodes.name: A Nice Place to Visit
episodes.title: A Nice Place to Visit
episodes.overview: After being shot to death, the criminal Rocky Valentine encounters the amiable white-haired Mr. Pip in the afterlife, who gives him everything he wishes for.

episodes.name: Nightmare as a Child
episodes.title: Nightmare as a Child
episodes.overview: Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment, who tries to jog Helen's memory about a man she saw earlier that day.

episodes.name: A Stop at Willoughby
episodes.title: A Stop at Willoughby
episodes.overview: Riding home on the train one day, a stressed businessman falls asleep and dreams it is 1888, and he is entering a small, idyllic town called Willoughby.

episodes.name: The Chaser
episodes.title: The Chaser
episodes.overview: A man, desperate to win the affection of a beautiful woman, seeks the help of an old professor, who provides him with a love potion.

episodes.name: A Passage for Trumpet
episodes.title: A Passage for Trumpet
episodes.overview: A down-and-out trumpet player who's convinced he'll never amount to anything attempts suicide and finds himself in a world where no one can hear or see him.

episodes.name: Mr. Bevis
episodes.title: Mr. Bevis
episodes.overview: After losing his job, his car and his apartment on the same day, an eccentric loser gets a new lease on life from his guardian angel, but there is a price for keeping it.

episodes.name: The After Hours
episodes.title: The After Hours
episodes.overview: Puzzled and unsettled by the odd behavior of the salespeople, a woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist.

episodes.name: The Mighty Casey
episodes.title: The Mighty Casey
episodes.overview: A baseball manager takes his team to the championships thanks to a robot pitcher.

episodes.name: A World of His Own
episodes.title: A World of His Own
episodes.overview: Coming home, Victoria catches her husband Gregory flirting with a beautiful woman in his study. His explanation that characters come to life before his eyes when he speaks into his dictation machine, leads Victoria to question his sanity.

episodes.name: King Nine Will Not Return
episodes.title: King Nine Will Not Return
episodes.overview: A WWII captain finds himself in the desert, next to his crashed plane, and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

episodes.name: The Man in the Bottle
episodes.title: The Man in the Bottle
episodes.overview: A discontented curio shop owner thinks he's finally found happiness when a genie he discovers in an old bottle grants him four wishes.

episodes.name: Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
episodes.title: Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
episodes.overview: Ordered to commit a murder he doesn't want to perform, a smalltime hood nervously looks in the mirror and sees the man he could have been--confident, strong...and determined to get out.

episodes.name: A Thing About Machines
episodes.title: A Thing About Machines
episodes.overview: A writer feels that the machines in his house are conspiring against him.

episodes.name: The Howling Man
episodes.title: The Howling Man
episodes.overview: A man on a walking trip of post-World War I Europe gets caught in a storm. He comes across a remote monastery with a mysterious prisoner.

episodes.name: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: A young woman lying in a hospital bed awaits the outcome of an experimental treatment in an attempt to make her look normal.

episodes.name: Nick of Time
episodes.title: Nick of Time
episodes.overview: A superstitious newlywed becomes obsessed by a penny fortune-telling machine when he and his new wife are stranded with car trouble.

episodes.name: The Lateness of the Hour
episodes.title: The Lateness of the Hour
episodes.overview: Jana, the daughter of inventor Dr. Loren, struggles with her parents' reliance on lifelike robot servants, urging her father to dismantle them despite his attachment to his creations.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Templeton
episodes.title: The Trouble with Templeton
episodes.overview: Booth Templeton is an aging actor who longs for the old days when his wife was alive.  Miraculously, he is given a sobering glimpse of the past he holds so dear.

episodes.name: A Most Unusual Camera
episodes.title: A Most Unusual Camera
episodes.overview: Chester Diedrich and his wife Paula, after burglarizing a curio shop, end up with a camera that takes pictures of events five minutes into the future.

episodes.name: The Night of the Meek
episodes.title: The Night of the Meek
episodes.overview: A down-on-his-luck department store Santa Claus discovers a bottomless sack of toys.

episodes.name: Dust
episodes.title: Dust
episodes.overview: After selling the rope for a hanging, a greedy peddler, tries to sell the condemned man's father a bag of "magic dust."

episodes.name: Back There
episodes.title: Back There
episodes.overview: It's April 14, 1961. Peter Corrigan and friends are discussing time travel at their men's club. Corrigan suddenly becomes dizzy. When his head clears, he has moved back to April 14, 1865 - the date of Lincoln's assassination.

episodes.name: The Whole Truth
episodes.title: The Whole Truth
episodes.overview: A peculiar Model A automobile compels a used car dealer to tell only the truth.

episodes.name: The Invaders
episodes.title: The Invaders
episodes.overview: An old woman in an isolated farmhouse encounters tiny, hostile aliens.

episodes.name: A Penny for Your Thoughts
episodes.title: A Penny for Your Thoughts
episodes.overview: The lucky flip of a coin seems to give a mild-mannered bank clerk the power to read minds. But he soon learns that you can't believe everything you read.

episodes.name: Twenty Two
episodes.title: Twenty Two
episodes.overview: Miss Powell has a recurring nightmare about room 22 – a morgue.

episodes.name: The Odyssey of Flight 33
episodes.title: The Odyssey of Flight 33
episodes.overview: A commercial aircraft mysteriously travels back through time.

episodes.name: Mr. Dingle, the Strong
episodes.title: Mr. Dingle, the Strong
episodes.overview: Martians give Luther Dingle the strength of 300 men.

episodes.name: Static
episodes.title: Static
episodes.overview: Ed Lindsay hates television, so he gets his old radio out of the basement of the boardinghouse where he lives. He soon finds he can receive programs from the past when he's alone.

episodes.name: The Prime Mover
episodes.title: The Prime Mover
episodes.overview: Ace Larsen discovers his business partner has the ability to control objects with his mind. The pair head to Vegas to win big.

episodes.name: Long Distance Call
episodes.title: Long Distance Call
episodes.overview: A young boy find he can communicate with his dead grandmother through a toy phone.

episodes.name: A Hundred Yards Over the Rim
episodes.title: A Hundred Yards Over the Rim
episodes.overview: In 1847 a western settler sets out to find medicine for his dying son - and stumbles into modern-day New Mexico.

episodes.name: The Rip Van Winkle Caper
episodes.title: The Rip Van Winkle Caper
episodes.overview: Thieves put themselves into suspended animation for 100 years after hiding a million dollars worth of gold bars.

episodes.name: The Silence
episodes.title: The Silence
episodes.overview: A talkative man takes an offer to keep silent for a year for $500,000.

episodes.name: Shadow Play
episodes.title: Shadow Play
episodes.overview: Trapped in a recurring nightmare, a man tries to persuade those who are sentencing him to death that the whole scenario is not real.

episodes.name: The Mind and the Matter
episodes.title: The Mind and the Matter
episodes.overview: A book on the power of thought enables an irritable worker to re-create the world exactly as he wants it. But what he wants and what he gets are two different things!

episodes.name: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up?
episodes.title: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up?
episodes.overview: State Troopers follow the tracks from a frozen pond, into a diner. Inside they find a soda jerk, a bus driver and his seven passengers. The bus driver is certain only six people boarded his bus…

episodes.name: The Obsolete Man
episodes.title: The Obsolete Man
episodes.overview: In a future state where religion and books have been banned, a librarian is judged obsolete and sentenced to death.

episodes.name: Two
episodes.title: Two
episodes.overview: A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

episodes.name: The Arrival
episodes.title: The Arrival
episodes.overview: A plane lands safely, but all its passengers, pilot and crew are missing!

episodes.name: The Shelter
episodes.title: The Shelter
episodes.overview: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

episodes.name: The Passersby
episodes.title: The Passersby
episodes.overview: On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

episodes.name: A Game of Pool
episodes.title: A Game of Pool
episodes.overview: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

episodes.name: The Mirror
episodes.title: The Mirror
episodes.overview: After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

episodes.name: The Grave
episodes.title: The Grave
episodes.overview: Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

episodes.name: It's a Good Life
episodes.title: It's a Good Life
episodes.overview: Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.  Which is a real good thing.

episodes.name: Deaths-Head Revisited
episodes.title: Deaths-Head Revisited
episodes.overview: A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce, and is met by one of his victims.

episodes.name: The Midnight Sun
episodes.title: The Midnight Sun
episodes.overview: The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

episodes.name: Still Valley
episodes.title: Still Valley
episodes.overview: Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

episodes.name: The Jungle
episodes.title: The Jungle
episodes.overview: Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's voodoo doctor puts a curse on him.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time travelling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down!

episodes.name: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
episodes.title: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
episodes.overview: A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

episodes.name: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.title: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.overview: A gung ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

episodes.name: Nothing in the Dark
episodes.title: Nothing in the Dark
episodes.overview: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

episodes.name: One More Pallbearer
episodes.title: One More Pallbearer
episodes.overview: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Shoes
episodes.title: Dead Man's Shoes
episodes.overview: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.title: The Hunt
episodes.overview: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

episodes.name: Showdown with Rance McGrew
episodes.title: Showdown with Rance McGrew
episodes.overview: The star of a Western TV series suddenly finds himself transported back in time to the real Wild West, and face-to-face with the real Jesse James.

episodes.name: Kick the Can
episodes.title: Kick the Can
episodes.overview: A retiree living in a rest home thinks he has discovered the secret of youth — acting young, and in particular playing a children's game called "kick-the-can".

episodes.name: A Piano in the House
episodes.title: A Piano in the House
episodes.overview: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

episodes.name: The Last Rites of Jeff Myrtlebank
episodes.title: The Last Rites of Jeff Myrtlebank
episodes.overview: Jeff Myrtlebank comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely...

episodes.name: To Serve Man
episodes.title: To Serve Man
episodes.overview: The Kanamits, 9 foot tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.title: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.title: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: A six-year-old girl rolls under her bed and vanishes into a fourth dimension. Her parents and a neighbor struggle to free her before the hole between the dimensions closes forever.

episodes.name: Person or Persons Unknown
episodes.title: Person or Persons Unknown
episodes.overview: David Gurney wakes up to find that no one - his wife, his co-workers, his best friend, not even his own mother knows him.

episodes.name: The Little People
episodes.title: The Little People
episodes.overview: An astronaut declares himself a god when his ship lands on a planet populated by people smaller than ants.

episodes.name: Four O'Clock
episodes.title: Four O'Clock
episodes.overview: Oliver Crangle is a bitter, prejudiced man. Through unknown means he intends to shrink every evil person in the world at four o'clock.

episodes.name: Hocus-Pocus and Frisby
episodes.title: Hocus-Pocus and Frisby
episodes.overview: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of some aliens.

episodes.name: The Trade-Ins
episodes.title: The Trade-Ins
episodes.overview: An elderly couple visit the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.title: The Gift
episodes.overview: An alien who crash-lands into a remote mountain village stirs up the villagers' fears and animosity, but he befriends a little boy and gives him a mysterious present.

episodes.name: The Dummy
episodes.title: The Dummy
episodes.overview: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil.  He makes plans for a new act with a new dummy:  plans that Willie doesn't support!

episodes.name: Young Man's Fancy
episodes.title: Young Man's Fancy
episodes.overview: When a newlywed couple briefly return to the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

episodes.name: I Sing the Body Electric
episodes.title: I Sing the Body Electric
episodes.overview: A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

episodes.name: Cavender is Coming
episodes.title: Cavender is Coming
episodes.overview: Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

episodes.name: The Changing of the Guard
episodes.title: The Changing of the Guard
episodes.overview: An elderly private school teacher wonders if his life has meant anything as he contemplates suicide on Christmas Eve and is reminded by former students that he has, indeed, made an effect on the lives of his students over the years.

episodes.name: In His Image
episodes.title: In His Image
episodes.overview: A scientist tries to correct his imperfections by building a mechanical likeness of himself, which includes of all the finer qualities he is lacking.

episodes.name: The Thirty-Fathom Grave
episodes.title: The Thirty-Fathom Grave
episodes.overview: A US naval destroyer investigates a mysterious tapping sound coming from a sunken submarine.

episodes.name: Valley of the Shadow
episodes.title: Valley of the Shadow
episodes.overview: A reporter finds himself trapped in a small town where people can reverse time and do many other amazing things.

episodes.name: He's Alive
episodes.title: He's Alive
episodes.overview: Peter Vollmer, a small-time neo-Nazi leader, yearns for more power. Advised by a shadowy benefactor, Vollmer's following grows, as does his ego...

episodes.name: Mute
episodes.title: Mute
episodes.overview: A 12-year-old girl who lost her parents in a fire doesn't speak because she has grown up in a secret telepathic community. The couple who take her in, and her teacher, are determined to help her adapt to their society, no matter the cost.

episodes.name: Death Ship
episodes.title: Death Ship
episodes.overview: A three-man spacecraft lands on a planet only to discover the wreckage of a spacecraft identical to their own. Two of the crew are convinced that they are dead, but the captain refuses to see the truth.

episodes.name: Jess-Belle
episodes.title: Jess-Belle
episodes.overview: Jess-Belle enlists the aid of a local witch who casts a spell that makes Billy-Ben Turner fall in love with her.

episodes.name: Miniature
episodes.title: Miniature
episodes.overview: A lonely man falls in love with a mini museum doll, which he believes is alive.

episodes.name: Printer's Devil
episodes.title: Printer's Devil
episodes.overview: A wily old man, hired by a bankrupt newspaper editor, has the knack of predicting headline stories and claims to be the Devil.

episodes.name: No Time Like the Past
episodes.title: No Time Like the Past
episodes.overview: A man travels back in time to try to prevent some of history's catastrophes.

episodes.name: The Parallel
episodes.title: The Parallel
episodes.overview: An astronaut blacks out while orbiting the earth and ends up in a parallel universe.

episodes.name: I Dream of Genie
episodes.title: I Dream of Genie
episodes.overview: A man considers several possibilities when offered one wish by a genie.

episodes.name: The New Exhibit
episodes.title: The New Exhibit
episodes.overview: The curator of a murderers' row in a soon-to-be-defunct wax museum persuades the owner to let him keep the figures for awhile. When his wife attempts to destroy them, a new murderous rampage begins...

episodes.name: Of Late I Think of Cliffordville
episodes.title: Of Late I Think of Cliffordville
episodes.overview: A bored, wealthy businessman gets a chance to go back in time and start over, armed with all the knowledge he's acquired...an arsenal that's not as powerful as he thinks.

episodes.name: The Incredible World of Horace Ford
episodes.title: The Incredible World of Horace Ford
episodes.overview: Toy designer Horace Ford spends most of his time reminiscing about his idyllic childhood. But when he gets a chance to go back to those years he gets a bitter taste of reality.

episodes.name: On Thursday We Leave for Home
episodes.title: On Thursday We Leave for Home
episodes.overview: The leader of an expedition on an asteroid tries to convince the others that Earth is not worth returning to.

episodes.name: Passage on the Lady Anne
episodes.title: Passage on the Lady Anne
episodes.overview: A quarrelsome young couple find themselves taking a trip on the Lady Anne, an old passenger liner that is transporting a group of equally old passengers.

episodes.name: The Bard
episodes.title: The Bard
episodes.overview: An untalented would-be writer's career takes off when the ghost of William Shakespeare writes his script.

episodes.name: In Praise of Pip
episodes.title: In Praise of Pip
episodes.overview: Max Phillips is an alcoholic bookie that regrets that he wasn't a better father to his son, Pip, critically wounded in South Vietnam. A visit to an amusement park gives them both a second chance.

episodes.name: Steel
episodes.title: Steel
episodes.overview: A small-time promoter desperately in need of money takes the place of his broken-down robot in a prize fight where humans are barred from participating.

episodes.name: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
episodes.title: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
episodes.overview: A man, newly recovered from a nervous breakdown, becomes convinced that a monster only he sees is damaging the plane he's flying in.

episodes.name: A Kind of a Stopwatch
episodes.title: A Kind of a Stopwatch
episodes.overview: The world's biggest bore and most avid talker gets a magical stopwatch that can stop everything except him.

episodes.name: The Last Night of a Jockey
episodes.title: The Last Night of a Jockey
episodes.overview: Barred from the track for life, crooked jockey Grady boozily expresses the wish to escape his sordid surroundings and become a truly "big man." His wish is granted by his lookalike alter ego, but there's a heavy price to be paid at fadeout time.

episodes.name: Living Doll
episodes.title: Living Doll
episodes.overview: Erich is displeased when his wife buys an expensive doll for his step-daughter.  He becomes even more displeased when the doll tells him it doesn't like him!

episodes.name: The Old Man in the Cave
episodes.title: The Old Man in the Cave
episodes.overview: A mysterious guardian helps a tiny community survive after the Bomb destroys much of the Earth.

episodes.name: Uncle Simon
episodes.title: Uncle Simon
episodes.overview: To inherit her insufferable Uncle's estate, a woman learns she must serve his latest invention, which is endowed with his own persona.

episodes.name: Probe 7, Over and Out
episodes.title: Probe 7, Over and Out
episodes.overview: The lone survivors of two annihilated worlds are stranded on a distant planet.

episodes.name: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms
episodes.title: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms
episodes.overview: A modern day National Guard unit find themselves in the middle of Custer's Last Stand at the Battle of Little Big Horn.

episodes.name: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
episodes.title: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
episodes.overview: Trying to keep up with his younger wife, Harmon convinces his brother to inject him with an experimental youth serum.

episodes.name: Ninety Years Without Slumbering
episodes.title: Ninety Years Without Slumbering
episodes.overview: An old man fears that he will die if his grandfather clock stops running.

episodes.name: Ring-a-Ding Girl
episodes.title: Ring-a-Ding Girl
episodes.overview: A fan-club gift draws a movie star back home, where she disrupts local plans for a town picnic by offering a one-woman show.

episodes.name: You Drive
episodes.title: You Drive
episodes.overview: Driving home one rainy evening, Oliver Pope accidentally hits a boy on a bicycle. Pope flees the scene, determined to hide his guilt, but his car has other ideas.

episodes.name: The Long Morrow
episodes.title: The Long Morrow
episodes.overview: Before leaving on a decades long mission, astronaut Douglas Stansfield meets a woman and falls in love.

episodes.name: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross
episodes.title: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross
episodes.overview: A man finds that he can trade characteristics with others.

episodes.name: Number 12 Looks Just Like You
episodes.title: Number 12 Looks Just Like You
episodes.overview: In a future where everyone must undergo an operation at the age of 19 to make them identical to everyone else, one woman desperately tries to hang onto her own identity.

episodes.name: Black Leather Jackets
episodes.title: Black Leather Jackets
episodes.overview: Three tough-looking men on motorcycles disrupt a peaceful suburb when they move in. Yet the neighbors could never imagine just how dangerous these men really are.

episodes.name: Night Call
episodes.title: Night Call
episodes.overview: An elderly, wheelchair-bound lady receives strange anonymous phone calls in the middle of the night.

episodes.name: From Agnes – With Love
episodes.title: From Agnes – With Love
episodes.overview: A computer technician must deal with the queen of all femme fatales: a computer named Agnes who wreaks havoc on his love life.

episodes.name: Spur of the Moment
episodes.title: Spur of the Moment
episodes.overview: After being chased on horseback by a terrifying, unidentified figure in black, Anne Henderson faces the biggest decision of her life.

episodes.name: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
episodes.title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
episodes.overview: As a Confederate spy is about to be hanged, the rope breaks and he falls to the water below. Finally free, he races for his home where his family awaits... as does the terrible truth of his future...

episodes.name: Queen of the Nile
episodes.title: Queen of the Nile
episodes.overview: A columnist interviews a famous movie actress who has a secret to her eternal beauty.

episodes.name: What's in the Box
episodes.title: What's in the Box
episodes.overview: A cheating husband sees his secret revealed and it's horrible consequences on his just-repaired TV set.

episodes.name: The Masks
episodes.title: The Masks
episodes.overview: A wealthy dying man invites his family to a Mardi Gras party and insists that they wear masks specially made for them, threatening to cut off their inheritance if they refuse.

episodes.name: I Am the Night - Color Me Black
episodes.title: I Am the Night - Color Me Black
episodes.overview: On the day an unpopular idealist is to be executed for the killing of a racist bully, the townsfolk are shocked to see the skies have turned pitch black.

episodes.name: Sounds and Silences
episodes.title: Sounds and Silences
episodes.overview: A man's wish to listen to loud noise backfires.

episodes.name: Caesar and Me
episodes.title: Caesar and Me
episodes.overview: A ventriloquist's dummy goads him into committing  burglaries.

episodes.name: The Jeopardy Room
episodes.title: The Jeopardy Room
episodes.overview: A KGB agent plays games with a defector, whose life he's been ordered to take, by giving him three hours to find and defuse a bomb he has hidden in his room.

episodes.name: Stopover in a Quiet Town
episodes.title: Stopover in a Quiet Town
episodes.overview: The morning after a wild night of partying, a hungover married couple awaken in an unfamiliar and artificial place.

episodes.name: The Encounter
episodes.title: The Encounter
episodes.overview: A World War II veteran and a Japanese-American gardener battle each other over a war that ended more than 20 years ago.

episodes.name: Mr. Garrity and the Graves
episodes.title: Mr. Garrity and the Graves
episodes.overview: Jared Garrity arrives in the Old West town of Happiness, Arizona, proclaiming he can revive the dead.

episodes.name: The Brain Center at Whipple's
episodes.title: The Brain Center at Whipple's
episodes.overview: A factory CEO replaces human workers with machines.

episodes.name: Come Wander with Me
episodes.title: Come Wander with Me
episodes.overview: A singer searches for an authentic folk song.

episodes.name: The Fear
episodes.title: The Fear
episodes.overview: Two people in a remote cabin find signs of an extraterrestrial.

episodes.name: The Bewitchin' Pool
episodes.title: The Bewitchin' Pool
episodes.overview: Two unhappy children find a happy escape in a swimming pool.

episodes.name: Where Is Everybody?
episodes.title: Where Is Everybody?
episodes.overview: Mike Ferris finds himself in a town strangely devoid of people. But despite the emptiness, he has the odd feeling that he's being watched...

episodes.name: One for the Angels
episodes.title: One for the Angels
episodes.overview: A street salesman cleverly eludes Death. But if he lives, a little girl must die in his place.

episodes.name: Mr. Denton on Doomsday
episodes.title: Mr. Denton on Doomsday
episodes.overview: A has-been, drunk gunslinger finds his fast-draw abilities magically restored.

episodes.name: The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine
episodes.title: The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine
episodes.overview: An aging, former movie star lives and dreams in the past, constantly watching her old movies alone in her room.

episodes.name: Walking Distance
episodes.title: Walking Distance
episodes.overview: A stressed advertising executive, driving through the country, leaves his car and starts to walk toward his hometown, Homewood. He finds things exactly as they were when he was a child.

episodes.name: Escape Clause
episodes.title: Escape Clause
episodes.overview: A hypochondriac exchanges his soul for immortality and indestructibility.

episodes.name: The Lonely
episodes.title: The Lonely
episodes.overview: In 2046, imprisoned for murder on a distant asteroid, Corry receives an unexpected present that brings a semblance of companionship during his isolation.

episodes.name: Time Enough at Last
episodes.title: Time Enough at Last
episodes.overview: A bank teller, obsessed with reading, faces conflicts at work and home because of his passion for literature.

episodes.name: Perchance to Dream
episodes.title: Perchance to Dream
episodes.overview: A man with a heart condition explains to his psychiatrist that he feels extremely tired, because he is terrified of falling asleep for fear he might die.

episodes.name: Judgment Night
episodes.title: Judgment Night
episodes.overview: In 1942, a German wonders why he's on the deck of a British steamship, with no memory of how he got there.

episodes.name: And When the Sky Was Opened
episodes.title: And When the Sky Was Opened
episodes.overview: Recovering in the hospital after a space mission, Major William Gart is visited by his co-pilot Lieutenant Colonel Clegg Forbes, who insists on the existence of a third astronaut.

episodes.name: What You Need
episodes.title: What You Need
episodes.overview: A two-bit thug thinks he's found the key to a better life in an old sidewalk salesman who has the uncanny ability to tell people what they need the most.

episodes.name: The Four of Us are Dying
episodes.title: The Four of Us are Dying
episodes.overview: In this noirish tale, a man with the ability to change his face to resemble others gets into hot water with gangsters.

episodes.name: Third from the Sun
episodes.title: Third from the Sun
episodes.overview: With all-out nuclear war about to ignite, a scientist and his pilot friend plot to escape on an experimental spaceship.

episodes.name: I Shot an Arrow into the Air
episodes.title: I Shot an Arrow into the Air
episodes.overview: Three astronauts crash-land on an unknown planet and must confront survival challenges, unraveling their unity in the face of desperation.

episodes.name: The Hitch-Hiker
episodes.title: The Hitch-Hiker
episodes.overview: Alone on a cross-country trip, a woman continually encounters the same mysterious hitch-hiker who inexplicably reappears at various points in her journey.

episodes.name: The Fever
episodes.title: The Fever
episodes.overview: Tight fisted Franklin Gibbs is not pleased when his wife wins a trip for two to Las Vegas.  But things change when he falls under the spell of a slot machine that calls his name.

episodes.name: The Last Flight
episodes.title: The Last Flight
episodes.overview: A World War I flying ace flies through a mysterious cloud - and lands at a modern U.S. air base in the year 1959!

episodes.name: The Purple Testament
episodes.title: The Purple Testament
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Fitzgerald, serving in World War II, possesses the disquieting ability to foresee impending death by observing a strange glow on the faces of his men before battle.

episodes.name: Elegy
episodes.title: Elegy
episodes.overview: Three astronauts land on what looks like Earth 200 years before they left--only all of the people seem frozen in time.

episodes.name: Mirror Image
episodes.title: Mirror Image
episodes.overview: In a bus depot, Millicent Barnes experiences odd events, leading to concerns about her sanity.

episodes.name: The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
episodes.title: The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
episodes.overview: Paranoia strikes the residents of Maple Street when they believe human-looking aliens have invaded the neighborhood.

episodes.name: A World of Difference
episodes.title: A World of Difference
episodes.overview: Arthur Curtis, a successful businessman sitting in his office discovers that he is on a film set and everyone refers to him as Gerry Reagan, a movie star struggling with alcoholism and a declining career.

episodes.name: Long Live Walter Jameson
episodes.title: Long Live Walter Jameson
episodes.overview: Walter Jameson, a popular history professor, is suspected by his fiancée's father, another professor at the college, to be an immortal.

episodes.name: People are Alike All Over
episodes.title: People are Alike All Over
episodes.overview: After a space exploration crash-lands on Mars, the lone surviving astronaut is surprised to find that Martians are human-looking and friendly.

episodes.name: Execution
episodes.title: Execution
episodes.overview: Just before being hanged for shooting a man in the back, an outlaw cowboy in 1880 is transported into the future.

episodes.name: The Big Tall Wish
episodes.title: The Big Tall Wish
episodes.overview: Washed-up boxer Bolie Jackson, with the help of a special wish from his young friend Henry, miraculously switches places with his opponent during a comeback fight, turning the tide in his favor.

episodes.name: A Nice Place to Visit
episodes.title: A Nice Place to Visit
episodes.overview: After being shot to death, the criminal Rocky Valentine encounters the amiable white-haired Mr. Pip in the afterlife, who gives him everything he wishes for.

episodes.name: Nightmare as a Child
episodes.title: Nightmare as a Child
episodes.overview: Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment, who tries to jog Helen's memory about a man she saw earlier that day.

episodes.name: A Stop at Willoughby
episodes.title: A Stop at Willoughby
episodes.overview: Riding home on the train one day, a stressed businessman falls asleep and dreams it is 1888, and he is entering a small, idyllic town called Willoughby.

episodes.name: The Chaser
episodes.title: The Chaser
episodes.overview: A man, desperate to win the affection of a beautiful woman, seeks the help of an old professor, who provides him with a love potion.

episodes.name: A Passage for Trumpet
episodes.title: A Passage for Trumpet
episodes.overview: A down-and-out trumpet player who's convinced he'll never amount to anything attempts suicide and finds himself in a world where no one can hear or see him.

episodes.name: Mr. Bevis
episodes.title: Mr. Bevis
episodes.overview: After losing his job, his car and his apartment on the same day, an eccentric loser gets a new lease on life from his guardian angel, but there is a price for keeping it.

episodes.name: The After Hours
episodes.title: The After Hours
episodes.overview: Puzzled and unsettled by the odd behavior of the salespeople, a woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist.

episodes.name: The Mighty Casey
episodes.title: The Mighty Casey
episodes.overview: A baseball manager takes his team to the championships thanks to a robot pitcher.

episodes.name: A World of His Own
episodes.title: A World of His Own
episodes.overview: Coming home, Victoria catches her husband Gregory flirting with a beautiful woman in his study. His explanation that characters come to life before his eyes when he speaks into his dictation machine, leads Victoria to question his sanity.

episodes.name: King Nine Will Not Return
episodes.title: King Nine Will Not Return
episodes.overview: A WWII captain finds himself in the desert, next to his crashed plane, and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

episodes.name: The Man in the Bottle
episodes.title: The Man in the Bottle
episodes.overview: A discontented curio shop owner thinks he's finally found happiness when a genie he discovers in an old bottle grants him four wishes.

episodes.name: Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
episodes.title: Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
episodes.overview: Ordered to commit a murder he doesn't want to perform, a smalltime hood nervously looks in the mirror and sees the man he could have been--confident, strong...and determined to get out.

episodes.name: A Thing About Machines
episodes.title: A Thing About Machines
episodes.overview: A writer feels that the machines in his house are conspiring against him.

episodes.name: The Howling Man
episodes.title: The Howling Man
episodes.overview: A man on a walking trip of post-World War I Europe gets caught in a storm. He comes across a remote monastery with a mysterious prisoner.

episodes.name: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: A young woman lying in a hospital bed awaits the outcome of an experimental treatment in an attempt to make her look normal.

episodes.name: Nick of Time
episodes.title: Nick of Time
episodes.overview: A superstitious newlywed becomes obsessed by a penny fortune-telling machine when he and his new wife are stranded with car trouble.

episodes.name: The Lateness of the Hour
episodes.title: The Lateness of the Hour
episodes.overview: Jana, the daughter of inventor Dr. Loren, struggles with her parents' reliance on lifelike robot servants, urging her father to dismantle them despite his attachment to his creations.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Templeton
episodes.title: The Trouble with Templeton
episodes.overview: Booth Templeton is an aging actor who longs for the old days when his wife was alive.  Miraculously, he is given a sobering glimpse of the past he holds so dear.

episodes.name: A Most Unusual Camera
episodes.title: A Most Unusual Camera
episodes.overview: Chester Diedrich and his wife Paula, after burglarizing a curio shop, end up with a camera that takes pictures of events five minutes into the future.

episodes.name: The Night of the Meek
episodes.title: The Night of the Meek
episodes.overview: A down-on-his-luck department store Santa Claus discovers a bottomless sack of toys.

episodes.name: Dust
episodes.title: Dust
episodes.overview: After selling the rope for a hanging, a greedy peddler, tries to sell the condemned man's father a bag of "magic dust."

episodes.name: Back There
episodes.title: Back There
episodes.overview: It's April 14, 1961. Peter Corrigan and friends are discussing time travel at their men's club. Corrigan suddenly becomes dizzy. When his head clears, he has moved back to April 14, 1865 - the date of Lincoln's assassination.

episodes.name: The Whole Truth
episodes.title: The Whole Truth
episodes.overview: A peculiar Model A automobile compels a used car dealer to tell only the truth.

episodes.name: The Invaders
episodes.title: The Invaders
episodes.overview: An old woman in an isolated farmhouse encounters tiny, hostile aliens.

episodes.name: A Penny for Your Thoughts
episodes.title: A Penny for Your Thoughts
episodes.overview: The lucky flip of a coin seems to give a mild-mannered bank clerk the power to read minds. But he soon learns that you can't believe everything you read.

episodes.name: Twenty Two
episodes.title: Twenty Two
episodes.overview: Miss Powell has a recurring nightmare about room 22 – a morgue.

episodes.name: The Odyssey of Flight 33
episodes.title: The Odyssey of Flight 33
episodes.overview: A commercial aircraft mysteriously travels back through time.

episodes.name: Mr. Dingle, the Strong
episodes.title: Mr. Dingle, the Strong
episodes.overview: Martians give Luther Dingle the strength of 300 men.

episodes.name: Static
episodes.title: Static
episodes.overview: Ed Lindsay hates television, so he gets his old radio out of the basement of the boardinghouse where he lives. He soon finds he can receive programs from the past when he's alone.

episodes.name: The Prime Mover
episodes.title: The Prime Mover
episodes.overview: Ace Larsen discovers his business partner has the ability to control objects with his mind. The pair head to Vegas to win big.

episodes.name: Long Distance Call
episodes.title: Long Distance Call
episodes.overview: A young boy find he can communicate with his dead grandmother through a toy phone.

episodes.name: A Hundred Yards Over the Rim
episodes.title: A Hundred Yards Over the Rim
episodes.overview: In 1847 a western settler sets out to find medicine for his dying son - and stumbles into modern-day New Mexico.

episodes.name: The Rip Van Winkle Caper
episodes.title: The Rip Van Winkle Caper
episodes.overview: Thieves put themselves into suspended animation for 100 years after hiding a million dollars worth of gold bars.

episodes.name: The Silence
episodes.title: The Silence
episodes.overview: A talkative man takes an offer to keep silent for a year for $500,000.

episodes.name: Shadow Play
episodes.title: Shadow Play
episodes.overview: Trapped in a recurring nightmare, a man tries to persuade those who are sentencing him to death that the whole scenario is not real.

episodes.name: The Mind and the Matter
episodes.title: The Mind and the Matter
episodes.overview: A book on the power of thought enables an irritable worker to re-create the world exactly as he wants it. But what he wants and what he gets are two different things!

episodes.name: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up?
episodes.title: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up?
episodes.overview: State Troopers follow the tracks from a frozen pond, into a diner. Inside they find a soda jerk, a bus driver and his seven passengers. The bus driver is certain only six people boarded his bus…

episodes.name: The Obsolete Man
episodes.title: The Obsolete Man
episodes.overview: In a future state where religion and books have been banned, a librarian is judged obsolete and sentenced to death.

episodes.name: Two
episodes.title: Two
episodes.overview: A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

episodes.name: The Arrival
episodes.title: The Arrival
episodes.overview: A plane lands safely, but all its passengers, pilot and crew are missing!

episodes.name: The Shelter
episodes.title: The Shelter
episodes.overview: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

episodes.name: The Passersby
episodes.title: The Passersby
episodes.overview: On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

episodes.name: A Game of Pool
episodes.title: A Game of Pool
episodes.overview: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

episodes.name: The Mirror
episodes.title: The Mirror
episodes.overview: After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

episodes.name: The Grave
episodes.title: The Grave
episodes.overview: Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

episodes.name: It's a Good Life
episodes.title: It's a Good Life
episodes.overview: Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.  Which is a real good thing.

episodes.name: Deaths-Head Revisited
episodes.title: Deaths-Head Revisited
episodes.overview: A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce, and is met by one of his victims.

episodes.name: The Midnight Sun
episodes.title: The Midnight Sun
episodes.overview: The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

episodes.name: Still Valley
episodes.title: Still Valley
episodes.overview: Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

episodes.name: The Jungle
episodes.title: The Jungle
episodes.overview: Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's voodoo doctor puts a curse on him.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time travelling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down!

episodes.name: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
episodes.title: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
episodes.overview: A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

episodes.name: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.title: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.overview: A gung ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

episodes.name: Nothing in the Dark
episodes.title: Nothing in the Dark
episodes.overview: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

episodes.name: One More Pallbearer
episodes.title: One More Pallbearer
episodes.overview: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Shoes
episodes.title: Dead Man's Shoes
episodes.overview: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.title: The Hunt
episodes.overview: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

episodes.name: Showdown with Rance McGrew
episodes.title: Showdown with Rance McGrew
episodes.overview: The star of a Western TV series suddenly finds himself transported back in time to the real Wild West, and face-to-face with the real Jesse James.

episodes.name: Kick the Can
episodes.title: Kick the Can
episodes.overview: A retiree living in a rest home thinks he has discovered the secret of youth — acting young, and in particular playing a children's game called "kick-the-can".

episodes.name: A Piano in the House
episodes.title: A Piano in the House
episodes.overview: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

episodes.name: The Last Rites of Jeff Myrtlebank
episodes.title: The Last Rites of Jeff Myrtlebank
episodes.overview: Jeff Myrtlebank comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely...

episodes.name: To Serve Man
episodes.title: To Serve Man
episodes.overview: The Kanamits, 9 foot tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.title: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.title: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: A six-year-old girl rolls under her bed and vanishes into a fourth dimension. Her parents and a neighbor struggle to free her before the hole between the dimensions closes forever.

episodes.name: Person or Persons Unknown
episodes.title: Person or Persons Unknown
episodes.overview: David Gurney wakes up to find that no one - his wife, his co-workers, his best friend, not even his own mother knows him.

episodes.name: The Little People
episodes.title: The Little People
episodes.overview: An astronaut declares himself a god when his ship lands on a planet populated by people smaller than ants.

episodes.name: Four O'Clock
episodes.title: Four O'Clock
episodes.overview: Oliver Crangle is a bitter, prejudiced man. Through unknown means he intends to shrink every evil person in the world at four o'clock.

episodes.name: Hocus-Pocus and Frisby
episodes.title: Hocus-Pocus and Frisby
episodes.overview: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of some aliens.

episodes.name: The Trade-Ins
episodes.title: The Trade-Ins
episodes.overview: An elderly couple visit the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.title: The Gift
episodes.overview: An alien who crash-lands into a remote mountain village stirs up the villagers' fears and animosity, but he befriends a little boy and gives him a mysterious present.

episodes.name: The Dummy
episodes.title: The Dummy
episodes.overview: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil.  He makes plans for a new act with a new dummy:  plans that Willie doesn't support!

episodes.name: Young Man's Fancy
episodes.title: Young Man's Fancy
episodes.overview: When a newlywed couple briefly return to the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

episodes.name: I Sing the Body Electric
episodes.title: I Sing the Body Electric
episodes.overview: A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

episodes.name: Cavender is Coming
episodes.title: Cavender is Coming
episodes.overview: Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

episodes.name: The Changing of the Guard
episodes.title: The Changing of the Guard
episodes.overview: An elderly private school teacher wonders if his life has meant anything as he contemplates suicide on Christmas Eve and is reminded by former students that he has, indeed, made an effect on the lives of his students over the years.

episodes.name: In His Image
episodes.title: In His Image
episodes.overview: A scientist tries to correct his imperfections by building a mechanical likeness of himself, which includes of all the finer qualities he is lacking.

episodes.name: The Thirty-Fathom Grave
episodes.title: The Thirty-Fathom Grave
episodes.overview: A US naval destroyer investigates a mysterious tapping sound coming from a sunken submarine.

episodes.name: Valley of the Shadow
episodes.title: Valley of the Shadow
episodes.overview: A reporter finds himself trapped in a small town where people can reverse time and do many other amazing things.

episodes.name: He's Alive
episodes.title: He's Alive
episodes.overview: Peter Vollmer, a small-time neo-Nazi leader, yearns for more power. Advised by a shadowy benefactor, Vollmer's following grows, as does his ego...

episodes.name: Mute
episodes.title: Mute
episodes.overview: A 12-year-old girl who lost her parents in a fire doesn't speak because she has grown up in a secret telepathic community. The couple who take her in, and her teacher, are determined to help her adapt to their society, no matter the cost.

episodes.name: Death Ship
episodes.title: Death Ship
episodes.overview: A three-man spacecraft lands on a planet only to discover the wreckage of a spacecraft identical to their own. Two of the crew are convinced that they are dead, but the captain refuses to see the truth.

episodes.name: Jess-Belle
episodes.title: Jess-Belle
episodes.overview: Jess-Belle enlists the aid of a local witch who casts a spell that makes Billy-Ben Turner fall in love with her.

episodes.name: Miniature
episodes.title: Miniature
episodes.overview: A lonely man falls in love with a mini museum doll, which he believes is alive.

episodes.name: Printer's Devil
episodes.title: Printer's Devil
episodes.overview: A wily old man, hired by a bankrupt newspaper editor, has the knack of predicting headline stories and claims to be the Devil.

episodes.name: No Time Like the Past
episodes.title: No Time Like the Past
episodes.overview: A man travels back in time to try to prevent some of history's catastrophes.

episodes.name: The Parallel
episodes.title: The Parallel
episodes.overview: An astronaut blacks out while orbiting the earth and ends up in a parallel universe.

episodes.name: I Dream of Genie
episodes.title: I Dream of Genie
episodes.overview: A man considers several possibilities when offered one wish by a genie.

episodes.name: The New Exhibit
episodes.title: The New Exhibit
episodes.overview: The curator of a murderers' row in a soon-to-be-defunct wax museum persuades the owner to let him keep the figures for awhile. When his wife attempts to destroy them, a new murderous rampage begins...

episodes.name: Of Late I Think of Cliffordville
episodes.title: Of Late I Think of Cliffordville
episodes.overview: A bored, wealthy businessman gets a chance to go back in time and start over, armed with all the knowledge he's acquired...an arsenal that's not as powerful as he thinks.

episodes.name: The Incredible World of Horace Ford
episodes.title: The Incredible World of Horace Ford
episodes.overview: Toy designer Horace Ford spends most of his time reminiscing about his idyllic childhood. But when he gets a chance to go back to those years he gets a bitter taste of reality.

episodes.name: On Thursday We Leave for Home
episodes.title: On Thursday We Leave for Home
episodes.overview: The leader of an expedition on an asteroid tries to convince the others that Earth is not worth returning to.

episodes.name: Passage on the Lady Anne
episodes.title: Passage on the Lady Anne
episodes.overview: A quarrelsome young couple find themselves taking a trip on the Lady Anne, an old passenger liner that is transporting a group of equally old passengers.

episodes.name: The Bard
episodes.title: The Bard
episodes.overview: An untalented would-be writer's career takes off when the ghost of William Shakespeare writes his script.

episodes.name: In Praise of Pip
episodes.title: In Praise of Pip
episodes.overview: Max Phillips is an alcoholic bookie that regrets that he wasn't a better father to his son, Pip, critically wounded in South Vietnam. A visit to an amusement park gives them both a second chance.

episodes.name: Steel
episodes.title: Steel
episodes.overview: A small-time promoter desperately in need of money takes the place of his broken-down robot in a prize fight where humans are barred from participating.

episodes.name: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
episodes.title: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
episodes.overview: A man, newly recovered from a nervous breakdown, becomes convinced that a monster only he sees is damaging the plane he's flying in.

episodes.name: A Kind of a Stopwatch
episodes.title: A Kind of a Stopwatch
episodes.overview: The world's biggest bore and most avid talker gets a magical stopwatch that can stop everything except him.

episodes.name: The Last Night of a Jockey
episodes.title: The Last Night of a Jockey
episodes.overview: Barred from the track for life, crooked jockey Grady boozily expresses the wish to escape his sordid surroundings and become a truly "big man." His wish is granted by his lookalike alter ego, but there's a heavy price to be paid at fadeout time.

episodes.name: Living Doll
episodes.title: Living Doll
episodes.overview: Erich is displeased when his wife buys an expensive doll for his step-daughter.  He becomes even more displeased when the doll tells him it doesn't like him!

episodes.name: The Old Man in the Cave
episodes.title: The Old Man in the Cave
episodes.overview: A mysterious guardian helps a tiny community survive after the Bomb destroys much of the Earth.

episodes.name: Uncle Simon
episodes.title: Uncle Simon
episodes.overview: To inherit her insufferable Uncle's estate, a woman learns she must serve his latest invention, which is endowed with his own persona.

episodes.name: Probe 7, Over and Out
episodes.title: Probe 7, Over and Out
episodes.overview: The lone survivors of two annihilated worlds are stranded on a distant planet.

episodes.name: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms
episodes.title: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms
episodes.overview: A modern day National Guard unit find themselves in the middle of Custer's Last Stand at the Battle of Little Big Horn.

episodes.name: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
episodes.title: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
episodes.overview: Trying to keep up with his younger wife, Harmon convinces his brother to inject him with an experimental youth serum.

episodes.name: Ninety Years Without Slumbering
episodes.title: Ninety Years Without Slumbering
episodes.overview: An old man fears that he will die if his grandfather clock stops running.

episodes.name: Ring-a-Ding Girl
episodes.title: Ring-a-Ding Girl
episodes.overview: A fan-club gift draws a movie star back home, where she disrupts local plans for a town picnic by offering a one-woman show.

episodes.name: You Drive
episodes.title: You Drive
episodes.overview: Driving home one rainy evening, Oliver Pope accidentally hits a boy on a bicycle. Pope flees the scene, determined to hide his guilt, but his car has other ideas.

episodes.name: The Long Morrow
episodes.title: The Long Morrow
episodes.overview: Before leaving on a decades long mission, astronaut Douglas Stansfield meets a woman and falls in love.

episodes.name: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross
episodes.title: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross
episodes.overview: A man finds that he can trade characteristics with others.

episodes.name: Number 12 Looks Just Like You
episodes.title: Number 12 Looks Just Like You
episodes.overview: In a future where everyone must undergo an operation at the age of 19 to make them identical to everyone else, one woman desperately tries to hang onto her own identity.

episodes.name: Black Leather Jackets
episodes.title: Black Leather Jackets
episodes.overview: Three tough-looking men on motorcycles disrupt a peaceful suburb when they move in. Yet the neighbors could never imagine just how dangerous these men really are.

episodes.name: Night Call
episodes.title: Night Call
episodes.overview: An elderly, wheelchair-bound lady receives strange anonymous phone calls in the middle of the night.

episodes.name: From Agnes – With Love
episodes.title: From Agnes – With Love
episodes.overview: A computer technician must deal with the queen of all femme fatales: a computer named Agnes who wreaks havoc on his love life.

episodes.name: Spur of the Moment
episodes.title: Spur of the Moment
episodes.overview: After being chased on horseback by a terrifying, unidentified figure in black, Anne Henderson faces the biggest decision of her life.

episodes.name: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
episodes.title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
episodes.overview: As a Confederate spy is about to be hanged, the rope breaks and he falls to the water below. Finally free, he races for his home where his family awaits... as does the terrible truth of his future...

episodes.name: Queen of the Nile
episodes.title: Queen of the Nile
episodes.overview: A columnist interviews a famous movie actress who has a secret to her eternal beauty.

episodes.name: What's in the Box
episodes.title: What's in the Box
episodes.overview: A cheating husband sees his secret revealed and it's horrible consequences on his just-repaired TV set.

episodes.name: The Masks
episodes.title: The Masks
episodes.overview: A wealthy dying man invites his family to a Mardi Gras party and insists that they wear masks specially made for them, threatening to cut off their inheritance if they refuse.

episodes.name: I Am the Night - Color Me Black
episodes.title: I Am the Night - Color Me Black
episodes.overview: On the day an unpopular idealist is to be executed for the killing of a racist bully, the townsfolk are shocked to see the skies have turned pitch black.

episodes.name: Sounds and Silences
episodes.title: Sounds and Silences
episodes.overview: A man's wish to listen to loud noise backfires.

episodes.name: Caesar and Me
episodes.title: Caesar and Me
episodes.overview: A ventriloquist's dummy goads him into committing  burglaries.

episodes.name: The Jeopardy Room
episodes.title: The Jeopardy Room
episodes.overview: A KGB agent plays games with a defector, whose life he's been ordered to take, by giving him three hours to find and defuse a bomb he has hidden in his room.

episodes.name: Stopover in a Quiet Town
episodes.title: Stopover in a Quiet Town
episodes.overview: The morning after a wild night of partying, a hungover married couple awaken in an unfamiliar and artificial place.

episodes.name: The Encounter
episodes.title: The Encounter
episodes.overview: A World War II veteran and a Japanese-American gardener battle each other over a war that ended more than 20 years ago.

episodes.name: Mr. Garrity and the Graves
episodes.title: Mr. Garrity and the Graves
episodes.overview: Jared Garrity arrives in the Old West town of Happiness, Arizona, proclaiming he can revive the dead.

episodes.name: The Brain Center at Whipple's
episodes.title: The Brain Center at Whipple's
episodes.overview: A factory CEO replaces human workers with machines.

episodes.name: Come Wander with Me
episodes.title: Come Wander with Me
episodes.overview: A singer searches for an authentic folk song.

episodes.name: The Fear
episodes.title: The Fear
episodes.overview: Two people in a remote cabin find signs of an extraterrestrial.

episodes.name: The Bewitchin' Pool
episodes.title: The Bewitchin' Pool
episodes.overview: Two unhappy children find a happy escape in a swimming pool.

items.title: The Wire
items.overview: Told from the points of view of both the Baltimore homicide and narcotics detectives and their targets, the series captures a universe in which the national war on drugs has become a permanent, self-sustaining bureaucracy, and distinctions between good and evil are routinely obliterated.

media.title: The Wire
media.overview: Told from the points of view of both the Baltimore homicide and narcotics detectives and their targets, the series captures a universe in which the national war on drugs has become a permanent, self-sustaining bureaucracy, and distinctions between good and evil are routinely obliterated.

episodes.name: The Target
episodes.title: The Target
episodes.overview:
'... when it's not your turn.' - McNulty.

Baltimore homicide detective Jimmy McNulty gets into hot water and winds up assigned to a detail of narcotics outcasts charged with investigating drug lord Avon Barksdale and his powerful operation in Franklin Terrace. Meanwhile, Avon's nephew D'Angelo is fresh off beating a murder rap, but he finds himself demoted upon his return to the gang.

episodes.name: The Detail
episodes.title: The Detail
episodes.overview:
'You cannot lose if you do not play.' - Marla Daniels.
